texts.es: El Sr. Daniel  vive en la zona del plan 3000, vive en la casa de sus Padres, su esposa lo ayuda en la fabricación de las pelotas. El señor Daniel  hace pelotas # 5, # 4 y # 3, su taller esta en la casa de sus padres. El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar pegamento que trae de Cochabamba porque es mas barato, entrega las pelotas al por mayor en los mercados de los Pozos, la Ramada y en la Rotonda del plan 3000. El señor Daniel es una persona trabajadora que con el apoyo de su esposa y sus padres se esfuerza para seguir adelante, le va muy bien en su actividad y el Sr. Daniel es una persona muy trabajadora, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Daniel lives in his parents' house in the Plan 3000 area.  He wife help him make soccer balls, sizes #3, #4, and #5. He has a workshop is in his parents' house.  He plans to use his loan to buy glue that he gets from Cochabamba because it's less expensive.  He delivers the balls wholesales to the Pozos, Ramada, and Rotonda markets in Plan 3000.  Daniel is a very hardworking person, who, with the help of his wife and parents is making the effort to succeed.  He's doing well and working hard in his business, and he appreciates Emprender for the support they provide.

loans.use:
AUMENTO DE CAPITAL DE TRABAJO, COMPRA DE GOMA Y PEGAMENTO		
Increase working capital, and to buy glue and rubber.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en: Abel is a thirty-three-year-old enterprising father of two. He lives in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is responsible for caring for his children alone and his desire is to see them educated and employed. For three years, Abel has been operating a retail shop. His business has helped him to pay the school fees for his children. His ambition is to become a wholesaler in the next five years. With this loan, Abel intends to purchase sugar, salt, soap and cooking oil to sell in his shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar,salt,soap, and cooking oil  to sell

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El comité Virgen de las Mercedes nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Este comité es de Laurelty,  fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
La Sra. Leonor O., presidenta del grupo tiene 46 años, ella esta domiciliada es de Laurelty, es una mujer emprendedora e innovadora y trabaja en el mercado 4 como vendedora de ropas.
Ella posee un puesta en ese mercado frente a las galarias mas concurridas del lugar y de esa forma expone sus mercaderias y ofrece a los clientes que visitan el lugar.
Solicita el prestamo para la compra de ropas y juguetes para la epoca navideña ya que quiere estar preparada para esa epoca con todas las mercaderia que el cliente busca para comprar.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Virgen de las Mercedes" came into being through the management and support of another group that was working in the same area.

This group is from Laurelty, and their goal is for each member to achieve growth, both on a social and financial basis.  These women are known in the area to be very hardworking women.

Leonor O., 46, is the president of the group.  She is from Laurelty, and is an enterprising and innovative woman who works in the "Mercado 4" market selling clothing.  She has a stall in this market in front of one of the busiest shopping malls in the area, and in this way she exhibits her merchandise and offers her clothing for sale to the customers who visit this area.

She requests this loan to buy clothing and toys for the Christmas season, since she wants to be prepared for this season with all of the merchandise that her customers are looking to buy.

loans.use: to buy clothing and toys

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María Rosa, se dedica a la venta D. plantas ornamentales y frutales, resiD. en San Miguel, vive con su esposo y un nieto, la casa donD. viven es propia, aprendió este negocio por que en su familia ha sido esta la actividad que han realizado, ella ubica el negocio en el parqueo municipal D. San Miguel, actualmente está con la dificultad que necesita compra plantas, canastas y cestas pero no cuenta con los fondos, y solicita un préstamo para salir D. esta situación.
Su propósito es tener bien surtido el negocio, para que los clientes que la visiten puedan tener opciones para comprarle, además que su negocio sea estable y le genere las ganancias necesarias para pagar las deudas.
texts.en:
María Rosa earns her living selling ornamental plants and fruit trees.  She lives with her husband and one grandson in their own house in San Miguel.  She learned the business because it's what her family did.  The business is located in the San Miguel municipal park.  It's difficult for her now because she needs to buy plants and baskets but she doesn't have the money, so she is seeking a loan to mitigate the situation.

María Rosa's intent is to have a well-stocked business so clients have options for what to buy.  She also wants a stable business with sufficient profits to pay the bills.

loans.use: To buy plants and baskets.

loans.name: Segundo Alfonso

texts.es:
Segundo vende cangrejos listos para comer, vive con su esposa en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.  

Inicio su negocio para tener un ingreso económico estable y debido a que tenía un local básico en la parte delantera de su casa. Tiene ya 16 años con su comedor de cangrejos. Trabaja con su esposa y un empleado vendiendo cada cangrejo a $ 2.00 c/u según la variedad del plato que quiera los clientes se aumenta los cangrejos. Para una mejor preparación cada vez que cocina los cangrejos le coloca cerveza a la preparacion. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cangrejos para tener más volumen de ventas. En el futuro quiere remodelar el local para tener una mejo apariencia al público.
texts.en:
Segundo sells crabs that are ready to eat.  He lives with his wife in a neighborhood on the outskirts of the city called Paraiso de la Flor, located in an area known for its dirt roads and hills.

He started his business so that he could have a stable income; he has a small eatery located in the front of his house.  He has had this small crab restaurant for 16 years.  He works with his wife and an employee, selling each crab for $2.00.  Each customer can choose how many crabs they want, and how they want them prepared.  For better taste, he always cooks his crabs in a preparation that includes beer.  With this loan he wants to buy crabs to have a greater volume of sales.  In the future he wants to renovate his restaurant so that it would have a better appearance to the public.

loans.use: to buy crabs

loans.name: Dorah

texts.en:
Dorah is a married woman who lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is house rent. 

Dorah has operated a retail shop for the past six months. Her potential customers are passersby and neighbors. In addition she sells cloth which is another source of income. Dorah faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. She hopes to have a wholesale shop in the future.

Dorah decided to join Yehu to get financial assistance to improve her business. With a Kshs 20,000 loan she wants to purchase bundles of sugar, cooking oil and wheat flour for resale.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of sugar, cooking oil and wheat flour for resale.

loans.name: Rober

texts.es: Rober, de 32 años, está casado con Janeth, de 31 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Anderson, de 10, Sharon, de 8 y Paúl, de 5 años. En unión familiar viven en su casa propia; ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. El trabajo al que se dedica son las construcciones de casas, en las cuales también realiza el servicio de instalación de agua y tuberías. Pero la actividad que más, le gusta a Rober es la artesanía; desde que era joven se dedica al tejido de mantas, tapices, ponchos de lana. A los que gracias a su buen tejido y creatividad puede comercializarlo a los intermediarios que visitan constantemente el lugar, los que venden sus productos en diferentes lugares del país. Pero su mayor anhelo es tener un negocio que le de mayor rentabilidad, es por ello que más adelante piensa comprar un terreno, donde construirá su casa propia y pueda acondicionar un negocio de venta de comida. Es el primer crédito con MFP y, como un nuevo integrante de su banco comunal, se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con el crédito que obtendrá, le servirá para comprar 15 bolsas de carretes de hilos para tejer, ya que tiene un costo de S/. 120.00 soles cada una.
texts.en:
Rober, 32, is married to Janeth, 31, and they have three kids together: Anderson, 10; Sharon, 8; and Paúl, 5.  They live in their own house in the town of San Pedro de Cajas.  He works in home construction, and also installs pipes and water services.  But what Rober likes best is hand-crafts; ever since he was young he has made hand-woven wool blankets, rugs, and ponchos.  

Thanks to his quality weaving and his creativity he can market to middle-men who visit him all the time and sell his products around the country.  But Rober's biggest dream is to have a more profitable business, so he's thinking that down the line he'll buy some land where he can build his own house and put in a food-sales business.

This will be Rober's first loan with MFP, and, as a new member of his village bank, he promises to make his payments on time.  He plans to use his loan to buy 15 bags of spools of thread for weaving, since they cost 120 soles each.

loans.use: To buy 15 bags of spools of thread.

loans.name: Meyer

texts.es: Meyer, de 27 años, convive con Yovana, de 24 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Jean, de 5, Pool, de 3 y Maricielo, de 3 meses de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en casa de su tía, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Desde muy joven comenzó a tejer junto a su padre, con el tiempo lograron abrir una tienda de artesanía al costado de la iglesia de su localidad. Pero hace tres años que terminó su carrera de ingeniería zootécnica y, desde ahí comenzó a asesorar a los habitantes del pueblo donde nació en “San Pedro de Cajas”, se siente feliz por ello, ya que ahora los ganaderos de su localidad ya no tienen pérdidas en el cuidado de sus ganados. Le va muy bien en esto y, ahora piensa abrir una oficina de consultoría formal, donde pueda innovar con los estudios que realizó. De la misma manera desea seguir con la elaboración de sus tejidos, por ello está asiendo todo lo posible para sacar los permisos necesarios para exportar. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como profesional, se siente satisfecho de que existan personas, que apoyen a los que más lo necesitan. Con el crédito que obtendrá, le ayudará a invertir en la compra de un tanque criogénico, que oscila entre seis mil nuevos soles aproximadamente. Con esto podrá almacenar semen de animales, para poder hacer inseminaciones artificiales.
texts.en: Meyer, 27, lives with Yovana, who is 24.  They have 3 children: Jean, who is 5, Pool, who is 3, and Maricielo, who is 3 months old.  They live together as a family in the house of his aunt, located in San Pedro de Cajas.  From the time that he was very young, he started weaving with his father.  Over time, they managed to open a small handicraft shop on the side of the church in their locality.  But 3 years ago, he finished his degree in animal husbandry engineering, and since then, he started advising the residents of the town where he was born, in San Pedro de Cajas, on how to care for their livestock so that they won't have losses.  This business is going very well, and now he is thinking of opening a formal consulting office where he can innovate using his education.   At the same time, he wants to continue making his woven crafts, and in this area he is doing everything he can to obtain the permits needed to export.  This is his 2nd loan with MFP, and as a professional, he feels very pleased that there are people who support those in need.  With this loan he will invest in the purchase of a cryogenic tank, which costs about 6,000 Peruvian soles.  With this equipment he can store animal semen so that he can do artificial inseminations.

loans.use: to buy a cryogenic tank so that he can do artificial inseminations

loans.name: Yesica

texts.es: La Sra.  Yesica de 20 años,  de estado civil soltera, con un hijo de 2 años, tiene ya varios años dedicándose a la venta, comercialización y flete de polleras, actividad que realizaba junto a su madre desde muy temprana edad. La Sra.  Yesica envía su mercadería a los departamentos de Tarija, Beni y Cochabamba ya que cuenta con clientes fijos en dichos departamentos, ella se vio en la necesidad de solicitar crédito de nuestra institución debido a la demanda que se presenta en estas épocas del año, y necesita  comprar material como telas e hilos para la confección  de sus productos. Ella  presenta un buen historial de deuda en la institución con la que  ha trabajado, es un apersona muy responsable y muy dinámica, se encuentra muy  agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Yesica, twenty, is single and has one two-year-old child.  She's been working for a number of years marketing, selling, and distributing skirts.  She's been working with her mother from a very early age.  She sends her merchandise to the departments of Tarija, Beni and Cochabamba where she has steady clients.  She found herself in need of a loan from us because due to demand this time of year she needs to buy materials like fabrics and thread to sew her garments.  She has a good credit history with the institution she's worked with.  Yesica is a very responsible and dynamic person, and she is very grateful to us for the support we offer.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Sakina's Group

texts.en:
Sakina has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to financially assist her son in his business of selling betel leaves and cigarettes. He operates a small shop in the main market where he sells these products to his clients and earns a profit. He keeps different brands of cigarettes in his shop to fulfill the timely needs of his customers. He has been doing this business for the past 8 years and has obtained a good reputation. With the loan, he will buy betel leaves and cigarettes in bulk quantity for his shop. 
  
Sakina herself is a housewife who stays at home and does her household work. She lives with her family in a two-room brick house in the city of Riwind. It is a small city and known for its dairy industry in Pakistan. She moved here after her marriage. Her husband’s name is A. A., and he is above 55 years and doesn’t work.  

Sakina is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 3rd loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.  Sakina is hopeful that with the loan investment, her son will successfully be able to improve his business.

loans.use: To buy betel leaves & cigarettes for reselling

loans.name: Cora Maurelina

texts.es:
Cora de 28 años de edad es casada, habita junto a su familia en la colonia El Serrano, desde niña su papá le enseño a trabajar en la finca, y con esta actividad agropecuaria que desarrolla obtiene sus ingresos para los gastos familiares, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que asume los gastos del hogar. 

Cora esta solicitando 2do crédito para realizar mejora de su vivienda y poder hacer reparación de su dormitorio que actualmente esta en malas condiciones, y tener mejor calidad de vida. Cora se ha caracterizado por su excelente conducta de pago, y por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y dispuesta al trabajo. 

Expresa sentirse muy agradecida  por el servicio recibido de AFODENIC, ya que los creditos recibidos le han permitido mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Cora, 28 years old, is married and lives with her family in the El Serrano settlement.  Since she was a child, her father taught her to work on a farm.  With the farming activities that she carries out, she earns an income for family expenses.  In addition, she depends on the support of her husband, who assumes the household expenses.

Cora is requesting her second loan in order to carry out housing improvements, and to be able to repair and renovate her bedroom, which is actually in poor condition, and to have a better quality of life.  

Cora has distinguished herself with her excellent payment performance and for being a hardworking woman, responsible and ready to work.  She says she is grateful for the help she has received from AFODENIC, as the loans she has received have permitted her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: Repair and renovate a bedroom

loans.name: Timotea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “HUCHUY QOSQO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Lamay perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Timotea; La socia tiene 33 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene  3 hijos ella se dedica a la administración de su tienda abarrotes, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa y ahora desea implementar mas con nuevos adornos y comprar panetones, galletas de champan, vinos, champan, chocolates y adornos navideños, la socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la tienda en esta época de navidad y poder satisfacer a sus clientes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos navideños e implementar la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member belongs to the communal bank “HUCHUY QOSQO ”, located in the Lamay district, Calca province, Cusco department.  She is Mrs. Timotea, 33, living with her spouse and 3 children.  She spends her time caring for her grocery store, a small shop in her house.  Now she wants to install new decorations and purchase panetones, champagne cookies, wines, champagne, chocolates, and holiday decorations.  She wants this loan to invest in her shop during the holiday season, to be able to meet her clients' needs.  She is requesting this loan to purchase holiday products and to set up her grocery shop.  She is grateful for and values the loan provided in this way, and she also commits herself to complete her schedule of payments in the agreed time.

loans.use: Purchase of holiday stock

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesus de 34 años es habitante de la comarca Caño Blanco, integra su núcleo familiar, la esposa y dos niños, Maria Dolores de 13 años estudiando 5to grado de primaria y Jose Manuel de 3 añitos de edad, Don Jesus se dedica a la actividad de comercializacion de productos lácteos, ademas al cuido de ganado, apoyandolo en estas actividades toda la familia. 

Esta solicitando su 4to crédito para invertirlo en compra de ternero de desarrollo, para engordarlo y posteriormente venderlo a un buen precio que le permita obtener utilidades que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Cuenta con lo necesario para esta actividad, pues su finca presenta buenas condiciones técnicas para el desarrollo de hato ganadero, con pasto mejorado, tambien realiza actividades de saniamiento y nutrición animal, en su comunidad es conocido como un lider emuy querido y responsable.
texts.en:
Jesus, 34 years old, lives in the Caño Blanco region.  His immediate family is comprised of his wife and two children, Maria Dolores, who is 13 years old and studying in fifth grade elementary, and Jose Manuel, who is just three years old.  Don Jesus works in the commercial dairy industry, in addition to raising cattle.  The whole family supports him in this work.

He is asking for his fourth loan in order to invest it in the purchase of calves to raise, to fatten up and later sell for a good price that will allow him to make a profit to help in improving the living conditions of his family.  He has what is necessary to carry out this activity, as the conditions on his farm are technically well-suited for raising a cattle herd, with improved grazing pastures.  He also performs work involving sanitation and nutritution for his animals.  In his community, he is known as a well-liked and responsible leader.

loans.use: Purchase of calves

loans.name: Luciano Javier

texts.es:
Luciano de 44 años de edad  habita en la Colonia La Fonseca junto a su familia compuesta por su esposa y sus hijos, todos aportan al trabajo de la finca, desarrollando actividades de siembra de cultivos y cuido del gando. 

Luciano, solicita el 2do crédito a la institución de AFODENIC, para invertirlo en siembra de pasto mejorado para asegurar la alimentación del ganado en tiempo de verano y así mantener su hato ganadero con buen desarrollo y tener mayor peso y producción de leche. Ademas de la siembra se dedica a la venta de leche y de semoviente en el año, obteniendo ingresos que le permiten mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luciano, 44 years old, lives in Colonia La Fonseca with his family, made up of his wife and children, all of whom contribute to the work on the farm, sowing crops and raising cattle.

Luciano is requesting his second loan from AFODENIC in order to invest it in improved sowing of his grazing pastures to ensure the food supply of his cattle during the summer, and thus maintain the healthy development of his herd, enabling them to grow to a heavier weight and have a higher milk yield.  In addition to sowing, he works selling milk and livestock throughout the year, earning an income that allows him to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: establish grazing pastureland

loans.name: Emperatriz Elena

texts.es:
Emperatriz, resiD. en Santa Elena, departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la crianza D. cerdos, ella es V. y tiene un hijo D. 36 años él es el que la ayuda con el trabajo, doña Emperatriz vive junto a su hijo y un nieto, comenzaron este negocio por iniciativa propia, no tienen horario D. trabajo, y en este momento están con la necesidad D. adquirir un préstamo para comprar cerdos D. engorD. por un tiempo D. 3 meses para luego venderlos.
Este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar el negocio y que al momento D. la venta pueda tener la oportunidad D. recibir buenas ganancias, Su objetivo es crecer el numero D. cerdos en la granja para estabilizarlo y tener solvencia económica para enfrentar cualquier gasto imprevisto.
texts.en:
Emperatriz lives in Santa Elena, Usulután department.  She raises pigs.  She’s a widow and has a 36 year old son who helps her with the work.  Emperatriz lives with her son and grandson.  They started the business on their own initiative.  They have no fixed work schedule.  They currently need a loan to buy pigs to raise for three months and then sell.

This loan will help the business grow because at the moment of selling the pigs good profits can be earned.  Her objective is to increase the number of pigs in the farm to stabilize it and have economic solvency to be able to face any unforeseen expense.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Damaris Del Carmen

texts.es: Damaris Del Carmen tiene 43 años, tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 16 años, que tiene este negocio, esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues lo que ha logrado obtener hasta los momentos ha sido por la buena administración que realiza. Inicio con el propósito de obtener algo para su familia ella ha demostrado ser muy responsable y siempre está al pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan. Es por eso que quiere aprovechar este crédito para la compra de materia prima como toallas, sabanas, ropa en general, cosméticos y calzado pues quiere aprovechar esta época.
texts.en:
Damaris Del Carmen, 43, has three minor children in her care.  She sells general merchandise.  She’s been in this business for over 16 years.  This isn’t her first loan and what she has managed to accomplish so far is due to the good way she administers it.

She started off with the aim of earning something for her family.  She has shown herself to be very responsible and she is always watchful to have available what her customers want.  This is why she wants to use this loan to buy stock items like: towels, sheets, assorted clothing, cosmetics and footwear to take advantage of this season.

loans.use: To buy assorted merchandise.

loans.name: Germain

texts.es: Germain, de 36 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador; vive con su mamá y sus 2 hermanos, en una casa alquila, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Desde que era muy joven se dedica a la artesanía, más o menos hace 15 años. Sus principales tejidos constan de; ponchos, mantas, y juegos de tejidos de sillones (el forro que se coloca en los juegos de sala). Cada dos veces al mes viaja a las diferentes ciudades del país, donde vende sus tejidos a buen precio, es así que en todo este tiempo de trabajo ha logrado ganar mucha clientela. Ahora está ahorrando dinero para comprarse su casa propia, y acondicionar para que pueda explayarse en sus creaciones. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y en todo este tiempo aprovecho todo el apoyo que le brindó su banco comunal y, está seguro que más adelante con el entusiasmo de todos sus integrantes podrán salir adelante. Con el crédito que obtendrá, le ayudará a comprar hilos y algodón para su próximos tejidos.
texts.en:
Germain, 36, is a single, hard working man.  He lives with his mother and two siblings in a rented house located in San Pedro de Cajas.  From a very young age he has been a craftsman, for about fifteen years.  His main weavings are: ponchos, blankets and sets of living room furniture covers.

Twice a month he travels to various cities in the country to sell his items at good prices.  This is how he has managed to secure a large customer base as time has gone by.  He is now saving up to buy a house of his own and to equip himself to be able to go all out on his designs.

This is his 4th loan with MFP.  All this time he has used all the help he’s gotten from the communal bank well.  He is sure that with the enthusiasm every group member displays they will get ahead in time.

He will use the loan he’ll get to buy thread and cotton for his next weavings.

loans.use: To buy thread and cotton for his next weavings.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi a 34 ans et mère de 2 enfants. Pour améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants, elle fait la vente de produits d’alimentation. Elle compte dans cette activité près de 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé et expose ses produits à la devanture de sa maison. Elle sollicite au près de WAGES un prêt pour faire face à la demande sans cesse croissante.
texts.en: Akouvi is 34 years old and the mother of two children. To improve her children’s living conditions, she sells food products. She has almost ten years experience in this activity. She buys her stocks at the big market of Lomé and displays her merchandise in front of her house. She is seeking a loan from WAGES to meet a steadily increasing demand.

loans.use: To purchase food products

loans.name: Bequer

texts.es: Bequer, de 19 años vive independientemente en una casa alquila en la ciudad de Lima (capital del país). Pero cada mes visita a su mamá en la comunidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Hace tan solo 4 años que trabaja en una empresa de textiles, ahí aprendió todo lo necesario para poder defenderse en la vida, y a su corta edad tienen muchos proyectos y objetivos. En este corto tiempo aprendió todo lo necesario para el mantenimiento de maquinarias pesadas, esto le ayudo a ganar un poco más de dinero, ya que en sus tiempos libres ofrece este servicio a diferentes fábricas de la capital. Ahora Bequer, desea abrir su propia fabrica de ropa, ya tienen todo lo necesario para comenzar con su proyecto y, con las ganancias y el tiempo irá implementando más su taller. También piensa estudiar diseño textil, con el cual podrá innovar en sus diseños. Es el primer crédito con MFP y se siente feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal, que es uno de los más reconocidos en su localidad. Con el crédito que obtendrá le ayudará en la compra de una máquina industrial de coser simple, con ello podrá hacer carteras rectas y blusas. La suma que invertirá oscila entre los 800 dólares aproximadamente.
texts.en: Bequer, 19, lives on his own in a rented house in the city of Lima (the capital of the country).  Each month he visits his mother in the community of San Pedro de Cajas.  He has been working in a textile company for only 4 years, where he learned everything he needs in order to get by in life--even at his young age, he has many projects and goals.  In this short time he learned everything necessary about maintaining heavy equipment, which helped him to earn a little more money since he was able to offer this service to different factories in the capital during his free time.  Now Bequer wants to open his own clothing factory--he already has everything necessary to start his project, and with time and earnings he will continue to set up his workshop.  He also plans to study textile design, with which he will be able to innovate his own designs.  This is his first loan through MFP, and he is happy to belong to his communal bank, which is one of the most well-known in his area.  This loan will help him to purchase one standard industrial sewing machine that he will use to make bags and blouses.  The amount he will invest will be about $800.

loans.use: Purchase an industrial sewing machine

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en: Esperance is 29 years old and married to a farmer. She has four children between two and eight years old. One of her children goes to school.  Esperence has a shop in which she sells different commodities like sugar, soap and cooking oil. She has requested this loan to buy more sugar and cooking oil to sell.  She hopes to save money from the profit.  She would like her business to double the sales in the next two years.

loans.use: To buy more sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Yasmina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN S.”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yasmina; ella tiene 31 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia es estudiante de artes visuales en la Universidad de Bellas Artes de Cusco. La socia tiene las ganas de terminar su carrera para poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida para su hijo. 

La  socia solicita el préstamo para terminar su carrera y para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche entre otros. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Yasmina, 31, is a member of the “HATUN S.” communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She has a live-in partner and a son.   She studied Visual Arts at Cusco’s Universidad de Bellas Artes.  She wants to finish her professional studies so that she can offer a better quality of life to her son.

She is asking for funds to finish her studies and to buy basic need items like rice, sugar and milk, among others.

She thanks all those who will be part of her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To finish her professional schooling and to buy basic need items like rice, sugar and milk, among others.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila, D. 53 años, está casada con Pascual, D. 59 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con uno D. ellos, a quien cuidan y educan en su casa propia ubicada, en la localidad D. San pedro D. Cajas. En el pueblo D. San Pedro, la mayoría D. sus pobladores se dedican a la artesanía y el arte; pero muy pocas personas como Luzmila, encontraron éxito en otros campos D. desarrollo. Ella cuenta que hace 35 años, abrió una panadería y desD. ese entonces todo le va muy bien, la mayoría D. sus habitantes compran pan y pasteles en su negocio, el cual cada día venD. más. Pero como en la sangre D. un poblador D. San Pedro, corre el gusto por el arte, ella también se dedica al tejido y bordado; sus 20 años D. experiencia se refleja en su tienda D. artesanía en el parque central D. la localidad. Pero lo que más desea es abrir su panadería en diferentes lugares. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y se siente orgullosa del éxito logrado en su banco comunal, donD. sus integrantes son personas responsables y comprometidas. Con el crédito que obtendrá, le ayudará a comprar objetos artesanales al por mayor, para está campaña naviD.ña y si el dinero le alcanza comprará lana para diseñar las alfombras y tapices que le solicitaron sus clientes.
texts.en: Luzmila is 53 years old and married to Pascual, who is 59. They have 6 children, but only live with one of them, who they care for and educate in their home, located in San Pedro D. Cajas. In the town of San Pedro, most people specialize in arts and crafts. Very few people, like Luzmila, are successful in other fields. She says that 35 years ago she opened a bakery and since then everything has been going well. Most people buy their bread and pastries from her business and she sells more each day. But as a true blooded resident of San Pedro, she loves art and also weaves and does embroidery. Her 20 years of experience is reflected in her craft shop in the town's central park. But what she wishes most is to open her bakery in other locations. This is her fourth loan with MFP and she is proud of the success in the community bank, where it's members are responsible and committed. This loan will help her buy wholesale crafts for this holiday season and if the money will buy enough wool she will design carpets and tapestries, requested by her clients.

loans.use: Buy handicrafts and wool to make rugs.

loans.name: Patouani

texts.fr: Elle a 37 ans et est mariée. Elle a en charge 3 enfants. Elle est née à Tchitchao mais habite hedzranawoe.  Pour pouvoir  aider au foyer, elle exerce comme activité la vente d’alimentation générale. Son activité est    tellement rentable qu’elle a parfaitement remboursé plusieurs prêt  déjà. Elle cumule aussi 8 ans d’activité. Elle achète au grand marché de Lomé et expose ses différents produits à la devanture de sa maison. Elle espère  grâce à ce nouveau crédit accroitre sa marge bénéficiaire.
texts.en:
This lady is 37 years old and married with three children in her care. She was born in Tchitchao but currently lives in Hédzranawoé. 

To help support the family, she sells general food items. Her success in this activity has already enabled her to repay several loans. 

She has eight years experience in this business. She buys her stocks at the big market of Lomé and displays the merchandise in front of her house. She hopes that this new loan will help increase her profit margin.

loans.use: To buy general food products

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 2 hijos menores a su cargo. Su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general es una persona muy responsable. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, pues ha sido muy gratificante.  Desde hace 8 años que el sale todos los días a ofrecer la variedad de productos, que para él es muy importante ya que él aprendió como vendedor y así con el paso del tiempo ha logrado obtener su propio negocio. El financiamiento que solicito fue para la compra de calzado, cosméticos, ropa en general, productos plásticos, adornos entre otras cosas que le encargaron para esta temporada.
texts.en: Juan Carlos is caring for his two young children. He works selling general merchandise and is a very responsible person. This is not the first time that he has received financing, as it is has been very rewarding. For the past 8 years he has gone out every day to offer a variety of products, which for him is very important since he learned how to be a salesman. Over time he has managed to obtain his own business. The money he is requesting will be used to purchase footwear, cosmetics, clothes in general, plastic products, ornaments and other things that he was commissioned for this season.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: German Santiago

texts.es:
Germán, de 34 años de edad, reside en San Carlos, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la albañilería, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos: Wilber de 13 años, Iván de 9 años, y Wilfredo de 2 años de edad, don Germán trabaja de albañil construyendo casas cuando le solicitan y también atiende la agricultura.
Él esta es proceso de mejorar su vivienda pero no tienen  los fondos necesarios por lo que solicita un préstamo para poder comprar los materiales y realizar el trabajo, él compraría arena, láminas y cemento, con esta ayuda podrá llevar a cabo la reparación de la vivienda y ofrecer a su familia un hogar más seguro y confortable.
El sueño de él es ayudar a sus hijos para que estos se preparen con una carrera universitaria y tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Germán is 34 years old and lives in San Carlos in the Morazán department. He works in construction and lives with his wife and 3 children: Wilber-13 years old, Iván-9 years old, and Wilfredo- 2 years old. Mr. Germán works building houses when requested and also helps in agriculture.

He is in the process of improving his home but lacks the necessary funds, so he is requesting a loan to buy materials and get the job done. He would buy sand, cement sheets and with this aid may carry out the repair of the house and give his family a safer and more comfortable home.

His dream is to help their children so that they can earn a college degree and have a better future.

loans.use: Purchase of sand, cement and laminates.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN SONCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Isabel; ella tiene 35 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo;la socia se dedica a dar clases particulares a niños que necesitan  la socia es docente y por el momento dicta clases particulares, y así puede tener más tiempo para su familia hasta que pueda presentar sus papeles algún colegio de Cusco.

La  socia solicita el préstamo para la educación y alimentación de su hijo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member belongs to the community bank called “HATUN SONCCO”.  This group is located in the Cusco district, near the province and department of Cusco. Mrs. Isabel is 35 years old, married and has 1 child. She works giving private lessons to children in need. She is a teacher who currently teaches private classes; thus she has more time for her family until she can present her papers to a school in Cusco. She is requesting a loan for educating and feeding her child. She thanks those who are making this dream possible and promises to comply with the payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: This member is requesting a loan for feeding and educating her child.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío de 18 años, vive en unión familiar con su mamá y sus 6 hermanos en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. A los que quiere y aprecia mucho.Está joven señorita, hábil y con mucho futuro, estudia en el instituto de bellas artes de su localidad, donde está aprendiendo a pintar hermosos cuadros, pues el arte lo lleva en las venas, ya que su familia se dedica a la artesanía, su principal actividad es el bordado de disfraces, faldas y manteles. Ya tienen un año emprendiendo su propio negocio y según afirma le esta yendo muy bien y cada día tienen más pedidos. Ahora ella quiere trabajar muy duro, para expandir su negocio, y juntar el dinero necesario para poder estudiar la carrera de gastronomía. Es el primer crédito con MFP, y está segura que gracias a su banco comunal, logrará concretizar sus objetivos. Con el crédito que obtendrá, le servirá para la compra de telas, hilos y blondas. Insumos necesarios para elaborar las 35 faldas que le mandaron a realizar.
texts.en: Rocío is 18 years old and lives in the town of San Pedro de Cajas with her mother and 6 siblings, whom she loves and appreciates very much. This young girl, skilled with a good future ahead, studies at the Institute of Fine Arts in the area, where she is learning to paint beautiful pictures. Art is in her blood, as her family is dedicated to the craft. Her main activity is the embroidery of costumes, skirts and tablecloths. For the past year, she has already begun her own business and asserts it is going very well and every day has more orders. Now she wants to work very hard to expand her business and raise the money necessary to pursue a career in foods. This is her first loan with MFP and she is sure, thanks to her community bank, she will achieve her goals. With the loan she will purchase fabrics, yarn, and lace, the necessary inputs to produce the 35 skirts she was asked to make.

loans.use: Purchase of fabrics, yarn and lace for the development of skirts.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
El Banco D. Emprendimiento Nuevo Amanecer esta compuesto por ocho integrantes. 
La presidenta es la Sra. Esperanza,  tiene dos hijos  el padre D. sus hijos le pasa  una pequeña pensión que apenas le alcanza para la alimentación y ella tiene que trabajar para sus gastos  D. educación y personales D. sus hijos, la señora se dedica a la venta D. cosméticos y los fines D. semana se dedica a la venta D. comida   es muy trabajadora y su incentivo para seguir adelante son sus dos hijos, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara para la compra D. cosméticos que se encuentran en promoción  y después venderlos a un precio mayor y así poder obtener ganancias extras,  este banco D. emprendimiento este conformado por amigos  D. la zona  que  tienen una amistad D. hace varios años, cada una D. ellas tienen una actividad independiente trabajan todos los días   , se conocen bastante bien entre ellas en el grupo  existe la participación D. 1 varón D. igual manera es  muy conocidos con su respectiva actividad .es un banco muy organizado y  dinámico .
texts.en:
The New Dawn (Nuevo Amanecer) communal bank has 8 members.  The group President is Esperanza.  She has two children and she gets a small support payment from him that’s barely enough for their food.  She must work to cover her personal costs and the costs of her children’s education. She sells cosmetics and on weekends she sells prepared food. She is very hard working; her incentive to get ahead in life is her two children.

She will use the loan money to buy cosmetics that are currently on special promotion to later resell at higher prices thus obtaining extra profits.

This communal bank is maD. up of friends from the area who have been friends for several years.  Each of them has her own independent work every day.  They know each other quite well.  There is one male in the group who is also well known in is work.  The bank is very organized and dynamic.

loans.use: To buy catalogue cosmetics that are on special.

loans.name: Nadou Gnavo

texts.fr: Nadou a 43 ans et est mariée. Elle a 2 enfants en charge. Pour participer au ménage, elle fait la vente de produits d’alimentation et compte dans cette activité près de 8 ans. Elle est née à Lomé et habite Bè-kpota.  Pour avoir les marchandises, elle achète au grand marché de Lomé,  ensuite elle expose ses différents produits   à la devanture de sa maison. Le crédit sollicité sera essentiellement destiné à l’achat de 2 cartons de lait, 3 cartons de tomates et 4 cartons de savons.
texts.en:
Nadou is 43 years old and is married. She has 2 children in her care. To contribute to the household expenses, she has been selling food products for almost 8 years. 
She was born in  Lomé and lives in Bè-kpota. She buys her supplies at the grand market in Lomé,  then sets the different products out for sale in front of her house. 
The loan she is requesting will be used specifically for 2 boxes of milk, 3 boxes of tomatoes and 4 boxes of soap.

loans.use: To buy food products

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es: Carlos se dedica a una pulpería, desde hace 14 años que tiene este negocio,  el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda, en donde asisten vecinos, amigos, familiares y público en general, Carlos conoce muy bien a sus clientes y lo que más demandan. Esta no es la primera que realiza financiamientos ya que han sido un gran aporte. Actualmente es él quien se está haciendo cargo de sus 2 hijos menores de edad y les proporciona alimentos, vestimenta, estudios y les enseña a como sobrellevar la vida. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Carlos has had a grocery store for the last 14 years.  It is located in his home where friends, neighbors, family members and the general public come by.  Carlos knows his customers and what they need very well.  This isn’t his first loan because they have been of great use to him.

He is currently caring for his two minor children.  He feeds, clothes, educates and teaches them how to carry on in life.

The reason for the loan is to buy stock items like basic grains, sweets, beverages, bread and detergents, among others.

loans.use: To buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Doris; ella tiene 70 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chocolates, ella se dedica a preparar diferentes chocolates de diferentes sabores y luego los distribuye a las diferentes tiendas o también pone avisos publicitarios para poder vender los chocolates, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de chocolates. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como manjar, coco y chocolate para preparar los chocolates y bombones.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “Las Leonas de San Jeronimo” (“The Lionesses of San Jeronimo”) communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, also part of the province and department of Cusco. 

Her name is Mrs. Doris. She is 70 years old and married with 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling chocolates. Mrs. Doris works making different chocolates of different flavors. She then distributes them to different stores. She also puts out promotional advertisements to help sell the chocolates. This member wants to expand and improve her business selling chocolates. She is requesting this loan to buy baking materials like dulce de leche, coconut and chocolate to make her chocolates and bonbons. 

Mrs. Doris thanks all those who through this means take part in this dream. She is committed to making all repayments in the established timeframe.

loans.use: The member requests a loan to buy baking materials like dulce de leche, coconut and chocolate to make chocolates and bonbons.

loans.name: Lider Hortencio

texts.es:
Lider, elabora y tiene un taller de mármol cultivado. Vive con su esposa e hijo en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.  

El trabaja con una persona que hacia fibra y mármol pero quería más ingresos para mantener a su familia por eso que decidió comenzar su propio negocio de mármol cultivado. En la actualidad trabaja con dos personas ya que es muy cansado el trabajo desde las 10h00am hasta que terminen todos los trabajos pendientes. Su trabajo lo realiza con resina y químicos para poder realizar las baldosas de mármol. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar herramientas para poder hacer más marido sus baldosas de mármol. En el futuro quiere tener una galería para exhibir el trabajo que realiza y venderlo a un mayor volumen.
texts.en:
Lider fabricates cultured marble and has his own shop.  He lives with his wife and child in the peri-urban district of Paraíso de la Flor, located in an area known for its dirt roads and mountains.

Lider works with a person who made fiberglass and marble but wanted more income to support his family so he decided to start his own cultured marble business.  At present Lider works with two people because he's very tired; he works from 10AM until they finish all the scheduled work.  He works with resins and chemicals to make marble floor tiles. 

He plans to use his loan to buy tools to make even more marble tiles.  In the future he would like to have a gallery to display his work and sell more of it.

loans.use: To buy tools.

loans.name: Gregoria Lurdes

texts.es: La señora Gregoria tiene una pequeña tienda de barrio, su esposo es transportista propietario y tienen 2 hijos, su familia es muy unida y entre todos sus hermanos cooperan a sus papás. Ella y su esposo lograron establecerse con mucho esfuerzo todo para que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro y no tengan ninguna necesidad, la señora es cliente antigua de la institución y hasta el momento no presento problemas en sus pagos es puntual y responsable. El crédito solicitado es para la refacción de su tienda y para la compra de más mercadería ya que por estas fechas de fin de año sus ventas incrementan y ella quiere surtir su tienda, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Gregoria has a small neighborhood store.  Her husband is a self-employed cargo carrier.  They have two children.  The family is very united and all the siblings cooperate to take care of their parents.

She and her husband managed through much effort to become established so that their children may have a better future and not have any unmet needs.  She is a longstanding client of the institution and to date has had no problems repaying her loans on time and responsibly.  The requested loan is to refurbish and stock her store because during this end of year season sales increase and she wants to be well stocked.  

She is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To refurbish the store and to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Marisol July

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marisol July; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicharrones (es hecho a base de carne de chancho) y también cria animales como cuyes y gallinas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y los animales los hace engordar y luego los vende en diferentes ferias de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de chicharrones. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar los chicharrones como carne de chancho y papas al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Marisol July, 41, is a member of the “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO” (St. Jerome’s Lionesses) communal bank which is located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She has a live-in partner and two children.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of chicharrones (fried pork).  She also raises small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  She works from 8am until 5pm.  She feeds the animals to fatten them up for subsequent sale in the various markets in Cusco.  She’d like to expand her chicharrones sale business and is asking for a loan to buy ingredients, like pork and potatoes at wholesale, to cook them.

She thanks those who will share in her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make chicharrones, like pork and potatoes, at wholesale.

loans.name: Frida

texts.en:
Frida is 38 years old and is married with four children between the ages of 3 and 12 years old. She works with her husband they sell milk in Nyarugenge district in Rwanda.  Frida has nine years' experience in her business selling milk. She employs two people and her store is open from 7am until 9pm every day of the week. 

Frida has requested a loan from Kiva via Vision Finance Company for the purpose of expanding her business and she hopes to one day open a supermarket.

loans.use: To expand her milk sales business

loans.name: Vania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vania; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza y por medio de este negocio la socia saca delante a su hijo, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio que realiza. La socia solicita el préstamo para la mantención de su casa y estudio de su hijo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Vania, 31, is a member of the “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO” (St. Jerome’s Lionesses) communal bank which is located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is single and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of beauty products.  She supports her son through this means.  She wants to improve her business so is asking for a loan to support her home and for her son’s education.

She thanks those who will share in her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: For support of her home and for her son's education.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto, de 40 años, está casado con Dionicia, de 38 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos todos menores de edad. Con los que viven en unión familiar en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. Hace cuatro años que se dedica a la agricultura, donde sus principales sembríos constan de frutas como: plátano y piña. Los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa en la cooperativa de su localidad, donde hace algunos años, ya comenzaron a exportar. Por ello ahora se siente con más optimismo y motivación para tener sembríos de calidad. Ahora para poder visitar constantemente a sus cultivos, se compró residentemente una moto con lo que está seguro podrá salir adelanten en este nuevo reto, ya que según menciona, tiene más demanda cuando se exporta frutos de calidad. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y como buen hombre de trabajo, está ayudando a su banco comunal, para poder salir adelante “juntos”. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito para concretizar la compra de un terreno agrícola, donde piensa sembrar nuevos productos oriundos del lugar.
texts.en: Ernesto is 40 years old and married to Dionicia, who is 38 years old. They have 5 young children and the family lives together in their own house situated in the community of Sanchirio. He has been working in agriculture for four years, and his main crops are fruits such as banana and pineapple. After each harvest, he sells these crops in his local cooperative which started to export a few years ago. Because of this, he now feels more optimistic and motivated to grow quality crops. In order to visit his crops regularly, he bought himself a motorcycle. He is confident that he will be able to reach this new goal, as he says there is more demand when quality fruits are exported. It is his fourth MFP loan, and by working hard he is helping his communal bank to build a better future "together". This is why he has now decided to invest the loan specifically in the puchase of farmland upon which to grow new products native to the area.

loans.use: To buy land to sow crops native to the area.

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es: La Señora Juana vive en la zona de Pasankeri, zona ubicada en una de las laderas de la ciudad de La Paz, ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza  y Refrescos en las fiestas de provincias y los fines de semana en la popular zona del Gran Poder, lamentablemente tuvo que hacerse cargo de toda su familia por el fallecimiento de su esposo, con mucho esfuerzo logró salir adelante sola y con tres hijos a su cargo, también poco a poco logró comprar su casa donde vive actualmente, ella es una persona que administra bien sus gastos y para tener mayores ingresos construyó cuartos para ponerlos en alquiler, la señora es puntual y responsable con sus pagos. El crédito solicitado es para la refacción de su domicilio y necesita comprar material de construcción, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Juana lives in the district of Pasankeri which is located on one of the mountainsides of the ciy of La Paz.  She sells beer and soft drinks at provincial fiestas and also on weekends in the popular 'Gran Poder' district.  Unfortunately, Juana has had to take care of her family herself since her husband died.  With a lot of hard work she has managed to get ahead on her own with three children in her care.  She has also managed to buy her own home where she currently lives.

Juana is a woman who knows how to manage her expenses.  In order to make more income she built rooms that she could rent out.  She is punctual and responsible in making her loan payments.  She is requesting this loan to refurbish her home and she needs to buy building materials.  She is grateful to the institution for the support she has received.

loans.use: To refurbish her home

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladis; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa para niños, ella vende chompas, pantalones, polos y blusas, ella tiene un pequeño puesto en un centro comercial llamado el molino, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to “Las Leonas de San Jeronimo” communal bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, which is part of the Cusco province in the Cusco department.  Gladis is 30 years old, lives with her partner and has one child.  

Gladis alternates between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling children’s clothes.  She sells jackets, pants, polo shirts and blouses.  She has a small stand in a commercial center called El Molina.  She works from 8am until 7pm.  Gladis wants to improve her clothing sales business.  She is asking for a loan for the purchase of more merchandise.

She is grateful to those that will become part of her dream in this way.  She promises to fulfill her payments on time.

loans.use: For the purchase of clothing merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Santos Gabriela

texts.es: Santos Gabriela de 56 años, se dedica a la venta de envases y cuajada por libra, ella vive en el reparto Carlos Fonseca. Su negocio consiste en comercializar los envases vacios de cervezas, salsa de tomates, de mayonesa, salsa inglesa, envases de shampoo ella los limpia y los vende a una empresa que se encarga de comprárselo también vende las cuajadas de manera ambulante pues las consigue por medio de una amiga que se las proporciona a un precio accesible para que ella puede venderlas.  Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de cuajada y de algunos envases. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Santos Gabriela, 56, sells containers and curd by the pound.  She lives in the Carlos Fonseca district.

Her business is to sell empty containers of beer, tomato sauce, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce and shampoo.  She cleans and sells them to a company that is committed to buying from her.

She also itinerantly sells the curd, wich she gets from a friend that sells to her at an affordable price.

She is asking for this loan to purchase curd and some containers.  In the future, she wants to finish building her home.

loans.use: Working capital for business selling curd/recycled containers.

loans.name: Las Flores De Atotonilco Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama LAS FLORES DE ATOTONILCO porque a la presidenta le gustan mucho las flores y también al grupo en general, este grupo está ubicado en el estado de Hidalgo y tiene 9 integrantes. La señora Teresa A. H.  es integrante del grupo, tiene 37 años de edad, estudió hasta secundaria, su estado civil es madre soltera tiene un hijo de 12 años de edad, la señora se dedica a la venta de tortillas negocio que inicio hace 7 años solicita el prestamo para mejorar su negocio y posteriormente con sus ganancias darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: This group is named LAS FLORES DE ATOTONILCO (THE FLOWERS OF ATOTONILCO) because the president of the group likes flowers a lot and the rest of the members, in general, likes them as well. This group is located in the state of Hidalgo and has nine members. Teresa A. H. is a member of the group. She is 37 years old. She went to school until secondary school. She is a single mother and she has a 12 year old son. Teresa sells tortillas. She started this business seven years ago. She is requesting a loan to improve her business and to subsequently give her family a better quality of life with her profits.

loans.use: to improve her business

loans.name: Elvish

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS DE SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Elvish; el tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, el tiene un stand en el centro comercial el molino que atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m que trabaja junto a su esposa y juntos sacan adelante a su hijo, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, chompas, blusas, polos y casacas.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to “Las Leonas de San Jeronimo” communal bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, which is in the Cusco province and in the Cusco department.

Elvish is 29 years old, lives with his partner and has one child.  He alternates between his daily activities and his business of selling clothes.  He has a stand in El Molino commercial center, where he works from 8am to 10pm.  He works with his wife and together they raise their son.  He wants to improve his business.

Elvish is asking for this loan to purchase clothing, such as pants, jackets, blouses, polo shirts and coats.  He appreciates those that will become part of his dream in this way, and promises to fulfill his payments on time.

loans.use: For the purchase of clothing for resale [pants, jackets, blouses, polo shirts and coats].

loans.name: Las Heroinas Group

texts.es:
Ruth America , es Presidenta del Banco Comunal "Las Heroinas", Ruth America, es separada, tiene 56 años D. edad, es jubilada desD. hace 10 años. Empezò el negocio D. venta D. cosmèticos; ya que el pago percibido por su jubilaciòn era muy poco y no era suficiente para sus necesidades bàsicas en su hogar. Para ese entonces aùn tenìa a su cargo a una D. sus menores hijas, quien estaba en edad escolar. 
Al ver que el negocio D. cosmètica era una forma D. encontrase, y tratar D. nuevo con otras personas; ella viò que era un ingreso màs para el hogar, se avocò D. lleno a este negocio; posteriormente la invitaron para ser jefa D. zona. Actualmente venD. y adicionalmente percibe propinas por incrementar mas vendedoras a su grupo. En un futuro cercano la Señora Ruth G. adicionalmente a este negocio, le gustarìa vender productos naturales.
La Señora Ruth America es responsable D. su mamà D. 78 años D. edad, quien està delicada D. salud y necesita D. muchos cuidados; ademas D. una D. sus hijas, quien ya es mayor D. edad, El prèstamo que se le otorga, lo utilizarà para incrementar mercaderìa a su linea D. productos cosmèticos.
(en la foto, la señora Ruth America viste D. pantalon rojo, casaca azul y lleva lentes; es la segunda D. la derecha)

** Las dos fotos pequeñas corresponden a las dos Personas cuyas caras se muestran un poco ocultas.
texts.en:
Ruth America G. S., separated, is 56 years old.  She presides over “Las Heroinas” [The Heroines] communal bank.  She has been retired for ten years.

She started her cosmetics sales business to distract herself and avoid depression caused by the withdrawal from her last job, and because her retirement pay was very little and not enough to proviD. for her household’s basic needs.  

At that time she was still caring for her youngest daughter, who was in school.  She found that a cosmetics business was one way to find herself, and a way of again working with other people.  Ruth saw that it provided more income for her household.  She dedicated herself fully to the business, and afterward she was invited to become boss of the area.

Currently, she sells [cosmetics] and receives tips to add more sales people to her group.  In the near future, Ruth G. would like to, in addition to continuing this business, begin to sell organic products.  

Ruth G. shares her home with her mother and one of her daughters, who is an adult (in the photo, Ruth is dressed in red pants, a blue jacket and is wearing glasses; she is the second from the right].  The loan that she requests will be used to add merchandise to her line of cosmetics products.

**The two small corner photos show the two people whose faces are semi-obscured in the group photo**

loans.use: Buy cosmetic products to boost her sales

loans.name: Laura Luisa

texts.es:
Laura, confecciona y cose ropa en su casa. Vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. 

Desde pequeña ella aprendió a coser porque le gustaba. Pero al ya tener a sus hijos sin un padre decidió comenzar a trabajar en una máquina de coser que se la compro cuando era joven. Poco a poco pudo coser y tener ya un número definido de clientes. En la actualidad tienen su taller de costura y confección en su casa, trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta que termina sus pedidos. Realiza su trabajo haciendo enmendaduras, cociendo y confeccionando  para entregarlo el fin de semana. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar una máquina de coser, telas, hilos porque la que tiene ya esta vieja. En el futuro quiere tener un local para su negocio  y asegurar su vejez.
texts.en:
Laura designs and sews clothing from her home.  She lives in a periurban zone called Paraíso de la Flor, located in an area characterized by its dirt roads and mountains.

As a child she learned how to sew because she enjoyed it.  But having had her children without their father, she decided to begin working on a sewing machine that she bought when she was young.  Little by little she was able to sew and have some regular customers.

Currently, she does her design and alteration business from home.  She works from 9am until her orders are done.  She completes her work mending, sewing and designing by the end of the week.

With this loan she wants to buy a sewing machine, cloth and string, because what she has is old.  In the future, she wants to have a different location for her business and to be secure in old age.

loans.use: For the purchase of a sewing machine.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio, de 47 años, convive con Diana, de 45 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos: David, de 25, Judith, de 22 y Camil, de 16 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. Su principal trabajo consiste en el trabajó de albañil. Pero desde hace 4 años se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que le resulta más satisfactorio, ya que gusta mucho del trabajo en el campo, donde según Antonio “creció desde niño”. Sus principales sombríos constan de café, plátano y palta; el cual después de cada cosecha, lo comercializa en la cooperativa de su localidad, donde acopian el café para la exportación, mientras que sus cultivos de frutos los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad. Por ello más adelante tiene pensado, comprar más cantidad de terrenos agrícolas, donde pueda sembrar en grandes cantidades. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y como socio antiguo de su banco comunal, se siente dichoso, por todo el apoyo que ofrece y recibe en cada reunión con los integrantes de su asociación. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de 4 sacos de abono orgánico, para sus cultivos, y si el dinero le alcanza lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Antonio, 47, lives with Diana, 45.  They have six children but only three still live with them: David, 25, Judith, 22 and Camil, 16.  They live together as a family in their own house located in the community of Sanchirio.  His main work is as a bricklayer.  However, for the last four years he has also been farming, an activity that is more satisfying for him because he very much enjoys working in the fields where, according to Antonio, “he grew up as a little boy.” His main crops are coffee, banana and avocado.  He sells each harvest to his local cooperative which amasses the coffee for export.  The other fruits he sells in his city’s wholesale market.  His plans for the future are to buy more farm land where he can plant larger amounts.

This is his 4th loan with MFP.  As a longstanding member of the communal bank he feels fortunate for all the support he gets each time he gets together with the other members of the association.

He plans to use the loan to buy four sacks of organic manure for his crops.  If it’s enough money he will also buy building materials and supplies to finish building his house.

loans.use: To buy sacks of organic manure and building materials and supplies to finish building his house.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS LEONAS D. SAN JERONIMO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Amalia; ella tiene 79 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. caldos, ella venD. en el mercado D. Vinocanchon diferentes tipos D. caldos como caldo D. gallina y caldo D. carne, la socia trabajo desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio D. venta D. caldos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar los caldos como pollo y carne.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Amalia, 79, is a member of the “LAS LEONAS D. SAN JERONIMO” (St. Jerome’s Lionesses) communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily chores with a soup business.  She sells various kinds of soup, like chicken and beef soup, at the Vinocanchon Market.  She works from 8am until 4pm and wants to improve her business.  She is asking for funds to buy soup making ingredients like chicken and meat.

He thanks those who will be part of her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy soup making ingredients like meat and chicken.

loans.name: Centro Apaxco Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama CENTRO APAXCO porque a si se llama el lugar de donde son originarios sus integrantes, esta ubicado en el Estado de México,  el grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes. La señora Celina Rodríguez es integrante del grupo tiene 63 años de edad, estudió hasta la primaria, su ocupación es comerciante venta de abarrotes, su negocio lo inició hace aproximadamente 21 años y solicita el préstamo para surtir mercancía  y poder darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes, ella está muy contenta con su crédito porque así podrá lograr todos sus proyectos ya planeados y comprar una recámara. Además está trabajando para asegurar su futuro, pues a su edad ya no la contratan en casi ningún lugar y ella quiere conservar su negocio para su vejez.
Observaciones: las señoras se encuentran en el siguiente orden viendo la foto de derecha a izquierda:
1.- Gudelia V. C..
2.- Celina R. P..
3.- Claudia H. P..
4.- Maria Teresa A. Gudiño.
5.- Yazmin Cortes P..
6.. Ma Luz A. R..
7.- Maria Guadalupe M. C..
8.- Mariluz M. M..
9.- Ana Maria H. C..
10.- Ma Guadalupe A. R..
11.- Tomasa Evelina C. Montoy.
12.- Angela Zuñiga M..
texts.en:
This group is called Centro Apaxco because all of the members are from the town of Apaxco, which is in the state of Mexico. The group is made up of nine members. 

One member, Celina R., is 63 years old and has a primary school education. Her business is grocery sales and she has been in business for approximately 21 years. She is seeking a loan to stock up on merchandise and offer better service to her customers. She is happy about the loan because it will enable her to finish the projects she has already planned and buy bedroom furniture. She is also working to provide security for her future. At her age, it is impossible to find employment, so she wants to keep running the business to provide for her old age.
 
In the photo, the members of Centro Apaxco appear in the following order from right to left:

1.- Gudelia V. C..
2.- Celina R. P..
3.- Claudia H. P..
4.- Maria Teresa A. Gudiño.
5.- Yazmin Cortes P..
6.. Ma Luz A. R..
7.- Maria Guadalupe M. C..
8.- Mariluz M. M..
9.- Ana Maria H. C..
10.- Ma Guadalupe A. R..
11.- Tomasa Evelina C. Montoy.
12.- Angela Zuñiga M..

loans.use: Buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “HUCHUY QOSQO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Lamay perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nicolasa; La socia tiene 58 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene  1 hijo ella se dedica a la venta y crianza de animales menores, también la socia trabaja con agricultura, ella se encarga de la compra de animales menores, los cría, engorda reproducen y luego los más maduros pasan a la venta, la socia también vende granos de maíz que produce sus tierras de cultivo, la socia desea ahora el crédito para poder comprar animalitos menores, ella comprará animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales menores.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Nicolasa, 58, is a member of the “HUCHUY QOSQO” communal bank located in Lamay district which is part of Calca province, Cusco department.

She is married and has a son.  She raises small farm animals for sale.  She also farms.  She buys the small farm animals, raises them, fattens them up, and breeds them.  Then, the older ones are sold.  She also sells corn kernels that her fields produce.  She wants a loan to buy little farm animals, she will buy animals.  She wants the loan to buy small farm animals.

She is grateful for and values the loan granted and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy small farm animals.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: El señor Hector Mantarî P. es cliente de la Caja Señor de Luren desde el año 2005 ha cancelado sus crèditos puntuales. El solicitante trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo de la localidad de Santiago de igual manera su esposa trabaja como obrera de campo en Ica Pacific donde es estable ambos se ayudan en los gastos familiares, viven en casa propia tienen cuatros hijos los cuales uno de ellos tiene a su cargo los demàs son independientes. Està solicitando el crèdito para mejoramiento de su vivienda y otros gastos adicionales, se propone otorgale el crèdito por presentar buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Mr. Héctor Mantarî P. has been a client of Caja Señor de Luren since 2005.  He has repaid his loans on time.  

He works as a field worker for a large farm in Santiago; his wife is a regular employee working as a field worker for Ica Pacific.  Together they contribute to family expenses. They live in their own home and have four children one of whom is still in their care; the others are independent.

He is asking for funds to do some home improvements and for some other additional expenses.  

Because he has good personal references, the loan will be granted.

loans.use: For home improvements.

loans.name: Las Industriales Group

texts.es: La foto fue tomada en el negocio de tortillas hechas a mano de la sra Camerina Z. S. Una integrante del grupo Las industriales, que está ubicado en la colonia Industrial, de la ciudad de Tehuacan en el estado de Puebla en México. Se ve el grupo al que pertenece y que lleva su nombre alusivo a la colonia en la que se reunen, se ve el local donde la señora elabora las toritillas que se dedica a vender,  ella inició este negocio hace seis años, solicita el prestamo para la compra de maiz y gas. Sus clientes prefieren comprar con ella por que da a buen precio y que son tortillas de muy buena calidad ademas de estar siempre calientitas e higienicas, su amabilidad y atención han hecho crecer su clientela . Al momento de solicitar su credito ella se siente contenta y agradecida por la confianza que se deposita sobre ella y sus compañeras. Tiene 34 años de edad y estudio hasta el sexto año de primaria es casada y tiene dos hijos una mujer y un varón de doce y tres años. Dentro de sus proyectos familiares ella quiere terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Mrs Camerina Z. S.'s business where she hand makes tortillas.  Camerina is a member of the “Las Industriales” group which is located in the Industrial district of the city of Tehuacan, in the State of Puebla, in Mexico.  You can see the group to which Camerina belongs.  The group's name is a reference to the district in which they meet.  You can see the premises where Camerina prepares the tortillas which she sells.  She started her business six years ago.  Camerina is requesting a loan to buy corn and gas.  Her customers like to buy from her because she sells for a good price and because her tortillas are good quality, as well as always being warm and hygienic.  Her kindness and good service have increased her  customer base.
