Marisabel D. Fuentes is 37 years old, separated and has 2 small children - 12 and 2 years old. They are the reason for her efforts and hard work to support them in achieving their education. Marisabel is a member of the group 'Amarilis Del Establo', together with 8 equally hardworking people.

Marisabel works selling lollies and soft drinks door to door, in different places in the Carabayllo district which is the zone where she lives. She started working independently when she was very young, embroidering polos and dressmaking, and little by little saved a small capital amount which permitted her to start her lolly sale business. Upon seeing that she maD. daily sales she began trying to sell as many as she could, and in this way her business has grown as she invests more to sell more.

With this business Marisabel has been able to improve her family's circumstances, as she doesn't have the permanent support of her husband and their fathers. Her daily work covers her main necessities, especially for her small children, and in the short term will allow her to install a grocery store in her house so she can dedicate more time to her children. It is for this reason Marisabel is seeking a loan to purchase stock and merchandise to implement her business and generate better earnings which will permit her to save and arrive at her goal. 

** Mr. Simeon V. Quiñones is in the small photo in the corner of the group photo **

loans.use: Purchase products and merchandise to stock business

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter, de 40 años, convive con Juana, de 34 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, todos menores de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. Su motivación para salir adelante, son sus hijos, es por ello que ya viene sembrando hace 8 años, café y plátanos. Lo que más le gusta a Walter es poder vender su producción, ya que según menciona es muy bueno en las ventas y su poder de negociación es lo que más lo caracteriza. Pues en cada cosecha, sus granos y frutos los vende en el mercado de su ciudad, donde ya es conocido y muy respetado. En adelante desea tener buenas plantaciones, ¡ya que a mayor calidad más ganancias!, afirma. Con su nueva meta espera tener buenas ganancias y de esa manera aumentar su capital, con el que piensa abrir una tienda de comestibles. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, se siente tranquilo por todo el apoyo que recibe constantemente, y agradece a todos los integrantes de su banco comunal por darle la oportunidad de trabajar mancomunadamente. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de varias plantas de café con el que realizará viveros para la renovación de sus plantaciones y si el dinero le alcanza invertirá en la limpieza de su sembrío de plátanos.
texts.en: Walter, 40, lives with Juana, who is 34.  They have 4 minor children.  The family lives in their own home, located in the community of Sanchirio.  His children are his motivation to get ahead.  It is for them that he has been farming for 8 years, cultivating coffee and bananas.  What Walter likes most is to be able to sell his products, since, as he mentions, he is very good at sales and is a good negotiator.  With every harvest, his grains and fruit are sold in the market in his city, where he is well known and respected.  In the future, he wants to have good cultivations, since, according to Walter "the better the quality, the better the earnings."  His new goal is to have good earnings and in this way increase his capital, with which he plans to open a grocery store.  This is his 4th loan with MFP, and he feels tranquil because of all of the support that he constantly receives, and he is thankful to all the members of his communal bank for giving him the opportunity to work together.  He plans to use this loan to purchase a number of coffee plants that he will use to establish a coffee plant nursery to renew his crops, and if there is sufficient money, to clear the lands where he cultivates bananas.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and to clear the lands where he grows bananas

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La  Sra..María tiene  49 años  es madre soltera de  3 hijos mayores. Ella posee un comedor dentro del mercado San Lorenzo desde hace 15 años, es un verdadero sacrificio ya que  empieza a trabajar desde muy temprano para tener listo el desayuno ,la media mañana y el almuerzo;gracias a este trabajo logro mantener siempre a su familia y la de su hermana quien trabaja con ella . 
El crédito será de ayuda para la compra de mercaderías en cantidad y así abaratar el costo de sus alimentos. María    anhela  construir un salón en su domicilio   y trabajar  en el mismo .
texts.en:
Maria, 49, is a single mother with 3 grown children.  She has had an eatery inside the San Lorenzo market for 15 years.  It is a true sacrifice for her, as she starts to work very early in the morning to have the breakfasts, mid-morning snacks and lunches ready.  Thanks to this work she has always managed to support her family and her sister, who works with her.

This loan will be used to purchase merchandise in volume, and in this way lower her food costs.  Maria wishes to build a room in her home so that she could work from her home.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, meat, rice, noodles, chicken, tomatoes, onions and bell peppers.

loans.name: Cristhian Antonio

texts.es:
Christian de 34 años, tiene un taller de electricidad. Vive con su esposa (aparece en la foto) e hijos en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Aprendió en un taller de electricidad donde el maestro y dueño era un chileno quien fue que le enseño todo lo que ahora sale de electricidad. Después que paso el tiempo él se independizo para tener sus propios ingresos. Por esa buena decisión ahora tiene su propio taller con dos ayudantes trabajan desde las 08h00am hasta las 17h00pm todos los días. El hace todo tipo de reparaciones eléctricas en casa y por contratos. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción como cemento y arena para poder construir mejor su casa. En el futuro quiere termina de construir su casa y tener dinero para comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Christian is 34 years old and has an electrical workshop.  He lives with his wife (who appears in the photo) and their children in a peri-urban area located on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran.  The area is noted for its deteriorating ecosystem.

Christian learned his trade in an electrical workshop.  The teacher and owner was a Chilean who taught him all he now knows about electricity.  After he learned the trade he set up his own business so that he could make his own income.  Owing to this good decision, he now has his own workshop with two assistants where he works from 8.00am to 5.00pm every day.  He makes all sorts of electrical repairs at home and on contracts.

Christian would like to use his loan to buy building materials such as cement and sand so that he can better build his house.  In the future, he would like to finish building his house and have enough money to buy a car.

loans.use: To buy cement and sand

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila, D. 60 años, está casada con Nicolás, D. 75 años. Ambos tienen 11 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 D. ellos: David, D. 28, Dorkas, D. 20 y Níger, D. 18 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad D. Sanchirio. El trabajo que realiza Cirila, es la producción D. café, piña y plátanos. Ya tiene 40 años dedicándose a ello y lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es poder estar cerca D. la naturaleza, pero como toda actividad, le molesta tener que bajar los precios D. compra en cada cosecha, ya que siente que sus esfuerzos no son recompensados. “el precio D. hace años, era muy bueno, con mis ganancias puD. educar a mis hijos”, afirma Cirila, que a pesar D. los inconvenientes que tienen se siente feliz, D. hacer lo que más le divierte y le gusta. Por ello Rosa buscará a una intermediaría que venda su producción, D. esa manera podrá expandirse y donD. puedan generar más ganancias viajando a todas partes del país. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y como mujer madura, siente que todavía le falta mucho para lograr sus objetivos. Objetivos que está segura D. lograrlos con el apoyo D. su banco comunal. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra D. varios sacos D. abono para el café que está sembrando. Y si el dinero le alcanza podrá invertir en la limpieza D. sus plantaciones D. plátanos.
texts.en:
Cirila is 60 years old.  She is married to Nicolás who is 75 years old.  They have 11 children but only live with 3 of them: 28 year-old David, 20 year-old Dorkas and 18 year-old Níger.  They live in their own home which is located in Sanchirio.  Cirila works growing coffee, pineapples and bananas.  She has been in this business for 40 years and what she most likes about her work is being close to nature but, as in every business activity, she doesn't like having to lower her prices with each harvest because she feels like her hard work hasn't been duly compensated.  “The price years ago used to be very good.  I could use my profits to educate my children”, Cirila says.

However, in spite of these drawbacks, Cirila feels happy because she is doing what she enjoys and what she likes doing.  She will look for a middleman to sell her produce because in that way she will be able to expand and earn more profits, travelling to all parts of the country.

This is Cirila's fourth loan with MFP and, as a mature lady, she feels that she still has goals to achieve.  She is sure that she will achieve her goals with the support of her community bank.  She plans to invest her loan in buying several sacks of fertilizer for the coffee crop which she is sowing.  If she has enough money left she will also invest in cleaning her banana plantations.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer and to clean her banana plantations

loans.name: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es:
El comité se formo en el Asentamiento 15 de Enero de la  Zona Espiritu  Santo del Barrio Barcequillo, por medio de otro grupo que trabaja en la misma zona, el comité cuenta actualmente con 15 integrantes todas vecinas entre si.
La Sra. Licia es una de las integrantes y cuenta con un depósito de mercaderías varias, tales como pañales, enlatados, golocinas, y todo tipo de productos no perecederos que los distribuye en menores cantidades para su venta en despensas, almacenes, etc.
Desea ampliar el negocio adquiriendo más variedad de mercaderías (enlatados, no perecederos), teniendo en cuenta la demanda existente y la calidad de sus productos, para así aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This committee was founded in the 15 de Enero sub-division of Espíritu Santo district, in the Barcequillo neighborhood through another group which works in the same district.  The committee currently has 15 members who are all neighbors.

Licia is one of the group's members and she has a warehouse for various merchandise such as diapers, canned goods, candies and all kinds of non-perishable products which she distributes in smaller quantities to be sold in grocery stores, etc.

Licia would like to expand her business by acquiring a greater variety of merchandise (canned, non-perishable goods), taking into account the existing demand and the quality of her products, so that she can increase her income.

loans.use: To acquire non-perishable, canned goods for resale

loans.name: Julio Felipe

texts.es:
Julio de 28 años, es taxista y recorre las calles de Guayaquil con una taifa muy económica dando un promedio de carrera entre $ 1.50 hasta $ 8.00. Vive con su esposa) en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Uno de los amigos de Julio le prestó un carro para que lo convierta en taxi hasta que el ahorre dinero para tener su propio taxi. Pasado el tiempo el pudo comprar un taxi y independizarse teniendo horarios desde la tarde hasta nocturnos ha trabajado para mantener a su esposa. 

Su casa no está bien construida porque no ha tenido posibilidad de mantenerla ya que su esposa es ama de casa quiere darle una mejo vida por eso el quiere el préstamo para compara cemento, arena y pinturas. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y tener un nuevo taxi.
texts.en:
Julio is 28 years old.  He is a taxi driver and works in the streets of Guayaquil, charging a very affordable fare.  On average, his journeys cost between $1.50 and $8.00.  He lives with his wife in a peri-urban area on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran which is noted for its deteriorating ecosystem.

One of Julio's friends lent him a car for him to convert into a taxi until he saved enough money to buy his own taxi.  Over time, he managed to buy his own taxi and start working independently.  He works from the afternoon into the night in order to support his wife.

Julio's house isn't well built because he hasn't managed to maintain it.  As his wife is a housewife, he would like to provide her with a better quality of life.  For this reason, he is taking this loan to buy cement, sand and paint.  In the future, he would like to finish building his house and to buy a new taxi.

loans.use: To buy cement and paint

loans.name: Jairo Josue

texts.es: Jairo José tiene 25 años, su actividad es la venta y reparación de bicicletas. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio, inicio este medio de vida por qué no tenia ingresos y tenía que mantener a su esposa y dos hijos que están menores de edad a su cargo. Pues anteriormente quien se hacía cargo era su Papa con el paso del tiempo e enseño a Jairo como administrarlo y seguir con el negocio. Actualmente solicita este crédito para la compra de pedales, asientos, cadena entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Jairo José is 25 years old.  His business activity is selling and repairing bicycles.  He has been in this business for more than 10 years.  He started his business because he didn't have any income and he had to support his wife and two dependent children.  His dad used to be in charge but, over time, he taught Jairo how to run everything and how to continue in the business.  Jairo José is currently requesting this loan to buy pedals, seats and chains, amongst other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
La Srta Raquel F., es una persona muy jovial, alegre con mucho espíritu emprendedor, tiene 28 años y vive en la casa de sus padres en la ciudad de Ñemby.
Una de su virtud es que es muy coqueta, le gusta cuidar todo lo que se refiere al cuidado de la belleza por esa razón ha decidido  habilitar un  SPA con salón de belleza , realizando también masajes reductores y con  anexo  de prendas de vestir  y bijouterí.
Al principio sólo pudo abrir la parte de Salón de belleza , dado que el lugar donde estaba ubicado su  micro-empresa  tenía poco espacio, eso la obligó a buscar un lugar más amplio y de esa manera así poder cumplir su sueño de tener un SPA, hoy día se siente realizada ya que logró su objetivo fijado en tan corto tiempo.
Según manifiesta dichos objetivos no hubiesen sido posible sin la ayuda de la herramienta más importante para ella que es la obtención de un préstamo para su fuente de capital operativo.
ELla solicto el prestamo para la compra de secadores de pelo, lavacabezas, juego de puf, artículos y herramientas de peluquería.
texts.en:
Miss Raquel Fernandez is a very jovial and happy person, with great entrepreneurial spirit. She is 28 years old and lives in her parents' house in the city of Ñemby. One of her virtues is that she is stylish, and likes to take care of all that relates to beauty care.

For that reason she decided to start a spa and beauty salon, offering also reduction massages, with an annex for clothing and jewelry. At first she was only able to open the salon, as the place where her micro-enterprise is located had limited space.

This forced her to seek for larger premises and this way she was able to realize her dream of owning a spa. She now feels fulfilled, particularly as she achieved her goal in such a short period.

She mentions that attaining those goals would not have been possible without the help of what she considers the most important, that is obtaining a loan as a source of operating capital. She is requesting this loan to buy a hair dryer, shampoo basins, a set of tuffets, and hairdressing articles and tools.

loans.use: Buy hair dryers, shampoo basins, a set of tuffets, hairdressing articles and tools

loans.name: Fabio

texts.es:
El Sr Fabio F., es un microempresario jóven, tiene  31 años de edad, vive en la casa de sus padres en el barrio San Pablo, es el mayor de tres  hermanos.
Fabio cuenta que ha trabajado mucho tiempo en otras Empresas dedicados a la confección de prendas y bordados de las mismas.
Pero con el tiempo y considerando ya el conocimiento que adquirió en cuanto a las producciones, el manejo de las máquinas, la atención al cliente, decidió ir formando de a poco para su microempresa y de esa manera independizarse, fue así que ayudados por sus familiares  quienes le cedieron espacio en la casa para que pueda habilitar una oficina y un taller de producción, más adelante fue adquiriendo  su primera máquina de hacer los bordados, que en un principio era suficiente para los primeros trabajos que realizaba por su cuenta.
Pero luego de unos años ya no abastecía con los pedidos de trabajos, y fue así que con mucho sacrificio adquirió una nueva máquina más sofisticada, que producía 10 diseños de bordados  en 10  minutos, y de esa manera hoy día puede cumplir con todos los clientes que tiene en las diferentes empresas renombradas del país.
A parte le encanta realizar sus propios diseños de bordados, para poder inclusive  ofrecer una gama de sugerencias a todos sus usuarios.
Dice que:  “Contar con un crédito siempre es bueno ya que le permite poder adquirir las diferentes materias primas que necesita para poder cumplir en tiempo y de esa manera brindar también calidad a los clientes”.
texts.en:
Fabio F. is a young businessman.  He is 31 years old and lives in his parents' home in San Pablo neighborhood.  He is the oldest of three siblings.

Fabio tells us that he has worked for a long time for other companies who make garments and embroideries.  However, over time and bearing in mind the knowledge which he had acquired as regards the production process, working machines and serving customers, Fabio decided to set up his own small business.  Helped by family members who provided him with space in their homes, he was able to set up an office and a workshop.  He acquired his first machine for making embroideries which was originally enough to cover the first jobs that he carried out in his own business.

However, for some years he couldn't manage with the orders which he had and so, through a lot of hard work, he acquired a new, more sophisticated machine which was able to produce 10 embroidery designs in 10 minutes.  In this way he is currently able to satisfy his customers who work for a number of well-known companies.

Fabio loves creating his own embroidery designs since it allows him to offer a range of suggestions to all his customers.

He says “Having a loan is always good because it allows me to acquire different raw materials which I need to fill my orders on time and thereby provide quality to my customers”.

loans.use: To buy different kinds of fabric and colored threads to create embroideries

loans.name: Lazaro Senon

texts.es:
Lazaro de 49 años, es taxista informal de las calles de Guayaquil. Tiene una casa de caña y cuanta con luz y agua en tanquero se encuentra en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas

Con la liquidación que le dieron en una empresa donde él trabajaba compro su un carro para convertirlo en un taxi. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm recorriendo las calles de todo Guayaquil y en ocasiones a las afuera de la ciudad. Unos de los inconvenientes es trabajar en las noches debido al índice muy elevado de la delincuencia. 

Para seguir trabajando en su carro él quiere comprar unos repuesto y llantas. En el futuro quiere comprar otro carro y así tener más ingresos para darle una mejor vida a su familia..
texts.en:
49 year old Lazaro drives a taxi in the streets of Guayaquil. He has a cane-built house with electricity and water that comes by tanker. His house is in a periurban area of the city called Paraíso De La Flor, which is in an area known for its dirt roads and mountains. 
He used the redundancy pay that he got from a company where he worked to buy a car and convert it into a taxi. Now he works from 7:00am until 10:00pm, driving through the streets of Guayaquil and occasional beyond the city. One of the disadvantages of this job is having to work at night because there is much more crime at that time. 
In order to be successful with his business, he wants to buy some spare parts and tires. In the future, he wants to buy another car and so increase his income so he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: Tires, spare parts

loans.name: Miriam Inocenta

texts.es:
Miriam de 42 años, vende productos de uso personal y ropa. Vive con sus tres hijos en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.  

Para proveer los gastos de la casa ella empezó a trabajar vendiendo productos de uso personal y ropa para darle una mejor vida a sus hijos ya que es madre soltera. Poco a poco ha incrementado su cartera de clientes porque trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes, cremas, ropa de todo tipo. 

Ella comprar la ropa y productos en un mercado a aun bajo costo. Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos y ropa. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Miriam, age 42, sells toiletries and clothing. She lives with her three children in an urban outlying zone called Paraíso de la Flor. This zone is located in an area known for its dirt roads and mountains. 

Miriam began to work selling toiletries and clothing to cover the household expenses and provide a better life for her children, as she is a single mother. Little by little she has expanded her customer portfolio. She has done this by working from the very early hours offering her products to her friends and neighbors. She sells perfumes, lotions and all types of clothing. 

Miriam buys her clothing and toiletries in a market at low cost. She wants to buy toiletries and clothing with this loan. In the future she wants to finish building her house.

loans.use: Perfumes, lotions, clothing

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana Maria tiene la veta de hornados y compra venta de ganado.  Ella vive en el municipio de Somotillo. Como no tenía oportunidades de trabajar ella comenzó a vender hornados, con algunos ahorros y ayuda de su esposo. Comenzó a tener rentabilidad y se quedo con el negocio vendiendo ambas cosas aun que con el ganado su esposo es quien se encarga del ganado y así juntos salir adelante. Con el préstamo quiere incrementar su capital de trabajo. En el futuro quiere mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana Maria sells bread products from the oven and also buys and sells cattle. She lives in the municipality of Somotillo.

As she had no opportunities for work, she began selling baked goods with some savings and help from her husband. The business was profitable so she stayed with it, and also with selling cattle, though her husband is in charge of the cattle. Together, they are making ends meet.

With the loan she wants to increase her working capital. In the future she wants to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase for her bread business.

loans.name: Sandra Karina

texts.es:
Sandra, resiD. en Concepción Batres, departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la venta D. helados y tienda D. productos D. uso domestico, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos D. 13 años y 3 años D. edad, este negocio lo inicio con el apoyo D. su esposo trabajando en lo propio, no tiene horario, y actualmente están con la iniciativa D. surtir el negocio preparándose ya para la época naviD.ña, motivo que les lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en mercadería.
Este préstamo le ayudara a crecer con el inventario y a disponer D. muchas opciones en productos para los cliente, así estará dándoles un mejor servicio y atención manteniendo siempre al fidelidad D. ellos.
Sus aspiraciones con respecto al préstamo son crecer cada vez más, mejorar su condición económica y establecer una mejor solvencia económica para la familia.
texts.en:
Sandra lives in Concepción Batres, in the department of Usulután. She has a store that sells ice cream and household products. She lives with her husband and her two children, who are 13 and 3 years old. She started this business with her husband’s help, with him working at the business. She doesn’t have a schedule. They are currently looking to stock up for the Christmas season, which is why they are requesting a loan to purchase merchandise.

This loan will help her to increase her inventory and have a variety of products for her customers. This way she can proviD. them better service and attention so that she can secure their customer loyalty.

Her hopes for the loan are that she’ll be able to grow her business, improve her economic situation, and establish better economic circumstances for her family.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Mario, tiene 24 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de medicina y ropa, vive con su esposa, su hermano y la esposa de este, tiene dos hijos de 8 y 5 años, él trabaja para la alimentación de su esposa y sus hijos, este negocio nació por la influencia de sus amigos, no tiene horario de trabajo.
Actualmente necesita dinero para invertir en el negocio y solicita un préstamo ya que no cuenta con la suficiente disponibilidad para realizar las compras; su inversión será en medicina y ropa, con este préstamo desea tener para los clientes de varios estilos de prendas de vestir así como la medicina para distintas enfermedades.
Sueña con un negocio amplio, que sus ventas sean por mayor, manejar bien este préstamo y mejorar las condiciones económicas de la familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 24 years old. He lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the department of San Miguel. He sells medicine and clothing. He lives with his wife, his brother, and his brother’s wife. They have two children who are 8 and 5 years old. He works to provide for his wife and their children. He started this business on the advice of his friends. He doesn’t have a set work schedule.

He needs money to invest in his business and he is requesting a loan because he doesn’t have sufficient cash to make the purchases. He will buy medicine and clothing. With this loan, he would like to make available to his customers various styles of clothing, and also medicines for a variety of illnesses. 

He dreams of having a large business and of having greater sales; of managing this loan well and improving the economic conditions of his family.

loans.use: To buy medicines and clothing

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Maura Germania

texts.es:
Maura vende comidas rápida en la parte delantera de su casa. Vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. 

Inicio su negocio para cubrir los gastos de su familia y ayudarle a su esposo. Comprando carnes, papas para hacer la comida rápida inicio su negocio desde la parte delantera de su casa. Poco a poco comenzó a tener clientela ya que era conocido por el sector donde vive. Vende papas fritas, hamburguesas, hot dog y trabaja desde las 06h00am hasta las 21h00pm. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar carnes, pollos para hacer mas comida rápidas. En el futuro quiere agrandar su negocio para que sus clientes se sientas a gusto comprando.
texts.en:
Maura sells fast food in front of her house. She lives in a peripheral neighborhood called Paraíso de la Flor, which is characterized by its unpaved streets and mountains. 

She began her business to cover her family’s expenses and to help her husband. She buys meats and potatoes to make the fast food in front of her house. She sells french fries, hamburgers, and hot dogs. She works from 6:00am to 9:00pm.

With the loan she will buy meats and chicken to make more fast foods. In the future, she would like to expand her business space so that her customers can be more comfortable when they buy from her.

loans.use: To buy meats and chicken

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, de 36 años, está casada con Víctor, de 43 años. Producto de su gran amor nació Erika, de 17 años de edad. En unión familiar los tres viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio (selva central peruana). Junto a su esposo Víctor, desde hace 13 años, se dedican a la agricultura. En todo este tiempo su principal cultivo consta de producción de café. Una vez al mes viaja a la ciudad de La Merced, para vender su producción a los principales acopiadores de la región. Pero no solo a eso se dedica Mercedes, ella también tiene un pequeño restaurante donde vende comida típica del lugar, su exquisita comida y buena sazón durante estos 6 años, garantizan su buena venta y ganancia. Por ello más adelante desea expandir su negocio. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y en todo este tiempo agradece los consejos de su banco comunal, que le apoyan en el logro de sus objetivos. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra, de 40 sacos de abono orgánico, para sus más de 4 hectáreas de café.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 36 years old. She is married to Victor, who is 43 years old. Their daughter, Erika, is 17 years old. The three of them live together in their own house, which is located in the town of Sanchirio (in the central jungle of Peru). 

She and her husband, Victor, have been working in agriculture for 13 years. Their main crop during this time has been coffee. Once a month she goes to the city of La Merced to sell her production to the main buyers in the region. But this isn’t Mercedes’ only business; she also has a small restaurant where she sells foods typical of the area. The excellent, well made food she has been making for the past 6 years guarantees good sales and profits. She would like eventually to expand her business. 

This is her fourth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, and she is grateful for the advice that has been provided by her communal bank because it has helped her achieve her goals. She has decided to use the loan to buy 40 sacks of organic fertilizer for her more than 4 hectares of coffee.

loans.use: To buy sacks of organic fertilizer for her more than 4 hectares of coffee plants.

loans.name: Glenda Yanira

texts.es:
Glenda, reside en Concepción Batres, departamento de Usulután, ella vive solo con dos hijos, es madre soltera y ellos tienen 5 y 8 años de edad, se dedica a la pupuseria este negocio fue gracias a una vecina que le enseño a prepararlas, así ella decidió hacer su propia venta para contar con dinero para los gastos del hogar.
Por el momento su dificultad es el poco crecimiento ya que no tiene dinero para invertir en el negocio, por esto solicita un préstamo para realizarle cambios al negocio y comprar materiales para la preparación de las pupusas. Este crédito le ayudara a mantener suficiente material como chicharrón, pollo, quesillo para la estar preparada para cualquier pedido de los clientes.
Su visión es tener un negocio bien establecido para proveer a sus hijos lo necesario para su crecimiento y educación mejorando de esta manera su futuro.
texts.en:
Glenda lives in Concepción Batres, in the deparment of Usulután. She lives alone with two children; she is a single mother and they are 5 and 8 years old. She makes and sells pupusas [corn tortillas with a variety of fillings]. She is in this business thanks to a neighbor who showed her how to make them. She decided to start her own business so she would have money for the household expenses.

At the moment her difficulty is that the business can’t grow because she doesn’t have money to invest in it. So, she is requesting a loan to make changes to her business and buy ingredients for her pupusas. This loan will help her keep enough ingredients on hand like pork, chicken, and cheese, so that she can make whatever the customers request.

Her vision is to have a well-established business and to provide her children with everything they need to grow and be educated, so that they can have a better future.

loans.use: To buy pork, chicken, and cheese.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 56 años, está casada con Prudencio, de 56 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven con Omar, su hijo, de 26 años de edad. Los tres viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. El trabajo al que se dedica Norma, es la venta de dulces, comestibles y bebidas, que realiza en su localidad en horas de la mañana. Mientras que por las tardes, se dedica a la venta de comida y diversos picadillos a base de las diferentes variedades de carne de la zona. Ya tienen 30 años dedicándose a ello y su exquisita sazón es el deleite de los habitantes de su comunidad. Por ello siempre esperan a Norma, para la hora de comida. En todo este tiempo tiene gran acogida y por ello desea más adelante, juntar más capital para poder acondicionar su propio establecimiento; una tienda y un restaurante grande con buena decoración, ya que Norma, solo vende en la calle. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y está agradecida por el apoyo que recibe junto a su banco comunal, de la misma manera menciona que será puntual en sus pagos. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de insumos como dulces, y diferentes materiales elaborados de plásticos.
texts.en:
Norma is 56 years old. She is married to Prudencio, who is 56 years old. They live with their son, Omar, who is 26 years old. The three of them live in their own house, which is located in the community of Sanchirio. 

Norma sells sweets, food, and drinks at her store in the mornings. In the afternoons, she sells food and a variety of minced meats made from the different types of meats in the area. She has been doing this for 30 years, and her excellent cooking is the delight of the people who live in the community. They always wait for Norma when it’s time to eat. Her food has been well received all this time, and so she would like, eventually, to set up her own place—a store and a big restaurant with nice decoration. Norma currently sells on the street. 

This is her fourth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and she is grateful for the support she has received from her communal bank. She says she will be punctual with her payments. She plans to use the loan to buy products such as sweets and different items made of plastic.

loans.use: Comprar dulces y materiales de plásticos.

loans.name: Zulma Arely

texts.es:
Zulma, se dedica a la ganadería, vive con su esposo y con sus tres hijos de 13, 9 y 5 años de edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, ella junto a su esposo trabajan con ganado desde hace algún tiempo, se apoyan mutuamente para desarrollar las actividades diarias que demanda la ganadería.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar ganado, su propósito es aumentar el número de animales para atender, con esto dará mayor estabilidad al negocio y tendrá la posibilidad de recibir mejores ingresos para solventar sus necesidades ya que sus hijos aun son  pequeños y necesitan mucho apoyo.
Ella sueña convertirse en una gran comerciante de ganado junto a su esposo, tener ganancias abundantes para dar a sus hijos lo mejor.
texts.en:
Zulma raises cattle. She lives with her husband and her three children, who are 13, 9, and 5 years old. She lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the department of San Miguel. She and her husband have been working with cattle for a long time. They work together to perform all of the daily activities required by the cattle. 

She is requesting a loan to buy cattle. Her goal is increase her number of animals; this will provide more stability to the business and she will have the opportunity to earn more income to provide for the necessities. Her children are still small and they require a lot of support.

She dreams of becoming a big cattle supplier, along with her husband, and of having abundant profits so she can give her children the best.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es: Felicitas, de 61 años, está casada con Segundino, de 70 años. Ambos tienen 11 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos: Esther, de 20 y Álvaro, de 18. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. Está luchadora mujer, de avanzada edad, se dedica hace 40 años a la agricultura, junto a Segundino, todas las mañanas se dirigen a sus terrenos de cultivo, donde cuida de sus plantaciones de maíz, plátano y café. Lo que más le gusta a ella, es limpiar sus cultivos, de la maleza que constantemente crece, a está actividad lo llaman “desyerbar”. Ya por las tardes, se dedica al cuidado de gallinas y cerdos a los que alimenta y vende su carne a los pobladores de su misma comunidad. Según afirma, está dichosa por los años que pasó en el campo, por ello está planeando más adelante seguir con sus cultivos. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP y a su edad siente que hay personas que confían en su trabajo, y sobre todo el esfuerzo que realiza, por ello agradece a su banco comunal, por la oportunidad brindada. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en construir su casa para poder arrendar cuartos, de la misma manera invertirá en la cancelación de pago de una motocicleta, ya que piensa trabajar ofreciendo servicio de trasporte público.
texts.en:
Felicitas, 61 years old, is married to Segundino, who is 70 years old. Together they have 11 children, but they only live with two of them: Esther, who is 20, and Alvaro, 18. They live together in their own home, located in the community of Sanchirio. She is a fighting woman of advanced age, who has been in agriculture for 40 years, together with Segundino. Every morning they go to their farmland, where they take care of their plantations of corn, bananas and coffee. What she likes the most is clearing their harvest of the weeds that are constantly growing, which they call "weeding".

In the afternoon, they take care of the chickens and pigs, which they feed and sell their meat to the inhabitants of their same community. She confirms that she is happy about the years that she has passed in the field, and she is planning to get ahead more with their harvests. This is her fourth loan with MFP, and at her age, she feels that there are people who have confidence in her work, and even more so in the effort that she puts forth. She is thankful for her community bank, and for the opportunity offered. She has thought to invest the loan in building her house in order to be able to rent rooms, and in the same manner, she will invest in paying off the debt of a motorcycle, since she is thinking of offering public transport service.

loans.use: To build her house to rent rooms and pay off the purchase of a motorcycle

loans.name: Carlos Asmel

texts.es:
Carlos, reside en San Rafael oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de medicina química, vive junto a su esposa, sus suegros, cuñados y su primer hijo de 1 año de edad. El negocio lo inicio con su suegro y juntos trabajan salen a visitar a los clientes todos los días, no tienen un horario fijo.
Actualmente tiene el plan de invertirle al negocio por lo que solicita un préstamo y realizar dicha inversión comprando medicina con una cantidad mayor y diversificar las clases de medicina; con esta ayuda el estará cumpliendo su plan para mejorar sus ingresos e ir creciendo poco a poco dentro del mercado.
Su aspiración es convertirse en un gran comerciante mayorista, distribuidor de medicina, para apoyar a su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos lives in San Rafael Oriente in the San Miguel department.  For work, he sells pharmaceutical medications. He lives with his wife, his wife's parents, his in-laws and his first son, who is one year old. He started his business with his father-in-law and together they make house calls for their customers every day. They don't have a set schedule. 

He requested the loan in order to help him to invest in his business. He'll be able to do this by purchasing a larger quantity and a greater variety of medications. With the help of this loan, he'll be able to achieve his goals of increasing his income and growing his business bit by bit. He aspires to become a major wholesale vendor and distributor of medications in order to support his family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase of medications

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Cecilia Daysi

texts.es:
Cecilia tiene una lavandería y cobra por canasta de ropa. Vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. 

Cuando se quedo sin trabajo empezó a utilizar la lavadora de su casa para lavar la ropa de los vecinos y obtener dinero por sus servicios de lavandería. Poco a poco vio que era rentable el negocio  y decidió que con sus ahorros compraría otra lavadora. En la actualidad tiene su lavandería en la parte delantera de la casa de la hermana, trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta el anochecer. Ella cobra cada canasta de ropa $ 5.00, y media canasta $ 2.50 eso incluye detergente, desinfectante, lavado y secado. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar detergente, suavizante, jabón para tener posibilidades de lavar mas ropa. En el futuro quiere tener una clientela muy grande.
texts.en:
Cecilia has a laundromat and she charges per basket of clothes. She lives in a suburb of “Paraiso de la Flor” (the flower paradise) characterized by its dirt roads and mountains. 
When she was out of work she started using the washing machine in her house to wash her neighbor’s clothes and earn money for her services as a laundromat. Little by little she saw that her business was profitable. She decided to buy another washing machine. Actually she has her laundromat in her sister’s house. She works from 9am until the evening. She charges $5.00 per basket of clothes and $2.50 per half basket. This includes detergent, disinfectant, softener, soap and drying the clothes. With this loan she would like to buy detergent, softener, and soap in order to be able to wash more clothes. She would like to have more customers in the future.

loans.use: detergent, softener

loans.name: Alberta

texts.es: Alberta, de 55 años, es una valerosa madre soltera, que con mucho esfuerzo y coraje; sacó adelante a sus 6 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con Edgar, de 20 años. A quien educa y apoya en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio. A pesar, de su avanzada edad ella afirma que no quiere dejar la agricultura, pues ya tiene 30 años dedicándose a esa actividad, así que lo considera como parte de su vida, ya que se acostumbró a levantarse en la madrugada para poder salir a cuidar sus plantaciones; de la maleza y aplicar abono a sus sembríos, pasar todo el día en el campo, es su mejor pasatiempo. Ahora sus sembríos de café, son los más estables en la comunidad, pues ahora todos los comerciantes mayoristas, ya la conocen y constantemente viaja a la ciudad de La Merced, para comercializar su cosecha. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y se siente segura de seguir adelante con su banco comunal, que son personas muy comprometidas con el desarrollo de sus miembros. Es por ello que ya ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de 8 sacos de abono, que oscila entre los S/. 105.00 nuevos soles cada bolsa.
texts.en:
Alberta, 55 years old, is a valiant single mother, who with great effort and courage has brought up her six children. Only Edgar, aged 20, still lives with her, and she educates and supports him in her own house in the community of Sanchirio. 

Despite her advanced age she says she does not want to stop farming. She has devoted 30 years to this activity, and  considers it part of her life. She has got used to getting up early to go out and take care her crops, weeding them and applying fertilizer, spending all day in the fields. This is her favorite hobby. Her coffee crops are now the most stable in the community. All the wholesale traders know her and always travel to the city of La Merced to market her crop yield. 

This is Alberta's fourth loan with Kiva Field Partner, MFP, and she feels secure in moving ahead with her Banco Comunal, where the people are very committed to the development of the members. Thus she plans to invest the loan in the purchase of eight bags of fertilizer, which cost about S /.105.00 nuevos soles per bag.

loans.use: To buy eight bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis tiene 22 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de especias, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa, su madre, sus dos hijas de 5 y 3 años de edad, él es el único que trabaja para mantener a su familia, por lo que debe tener  un  trabajo estable para poder proveer de lo necesario para el hogar, trabaja solo y fue influenciado por sus amigos, no tiene un horario fijo.
Él necesita un préstamo para la compra de especias ya que quiere tener mayor disponibilidad de producto para abastecer a los clientes y de esta manera mantenerlos  fieles a comprarles solo a él, Su proyección es aumentar el volumen de sus ventas para disponer de mayores ingresos para mantener a su familia y darle un mejor futuro, quiere además ser un excelente mayorista en este comercio.
texts.en:
Luis is 22 years old and makes his living selling spices.  He lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel Department with his wife, his mother and his two daughters, ages 5 and 3 years old.  He is the only one who works to support the family, so he needs to have a stable job in order to provide all that his family needs.  He works alone, was influenced by his friends and does not maintain fixed working hours.
He needs the loan to purchase spices.  He wants to have a greater quantity of his product available so that he can keep his customers well supplied, which in turn keeps them loyal to purchasing only from him.  His plan is to increase the volume of his sales.  He would then have more income at his disposal with which to support his family and give them a better future.  In addition, he wants to be an excellent wholesaler in this business.

loans.use: To purchase spices.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo, de 47 años, enviudo hace 8 años y junto a sus 3 hijos: Goldi, de 22, Maryerli, de 19 y Devie, de 17 años de edad; sale adelante. Él vive solo en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio (selva central peruana). Este excelente padre de familia, trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, a los que mira cada 15 días, ya que ellos realizan sus estudios superiores en la capital. 

Su principal actividad es la agricultura, ya tiene 10 años dedicándose a ello, sus principales cultivos son de café y plátanos, los que comercializa en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad, pero sus producciones de café la entrega íntegramente a la cooperativa de su localidad. Pero está actividad no le proporciona muchos recursos, ya que tiene que mandar mensualmente una suma considerable de dinero. Por ello Oswaldo, viaja constantemente a Pucallpa, donde realiza obras civiles como: cunetas, pistas, carreteras. 

Para más adelante desea comprar más hectáreas de café y de esa manera invertir en los estudios de sus hijos. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y agradece a su banco comunal por el apoyo que le brindaron en los momentos que más necesitaba y como presidente de su comunidad trabajará con honestidad e igualdad. 

Ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de 17 sacos de abono que le falta, para esparcirlos en sus plantaciones de 4 hectáreas de café, que oscilan entre S/. 48.00 soles cada una, asimismo invertirá en el pago a los peones quienes le ayudarán a sacar la maleza y aplicar abono en el campo agrícola.
texts.en:
Oswaldo, who is 47 and was widowed 8 years ago, is advancing, together with his three children, Goldi, who is 22, Maryerli, 19, and Devie, 17. He lives alone in his own house, located in the community of Sanchirio, in the central Peruvian forest. He is an excellent father to his family. He works very hard to bring up his children, whom he sees every 15 days, since they are working on their higher-level studies in the capital. 

His principal activity is agriculture, which he has already been working at for 10 years. His main crops are coffee and bananas. He sells the bananas at the wholesale market in his city, but he turns over his entire coffee crop to the cooperative in his area. But this business doesn't give him much return, and he has to send a considerable amount of money (for his children's education) each month. For this reason, Oswaldo travels constantly to Pucallpa, where he works on civil projects, such as on ditches, tracks, and highways.

In the future, he wants to buy more hectares of coffee and in this way have more income to invest in the education of his children. This is his second loan with MFP, and he is thankful to his community bank for the support that they have offered at the times when he most needed it. As president of his community bank, he will work with honesty and fairness. 

He is planning to invest this loan in the purchase of 17 sacks of compost, which he lacks, and which he will spread on his 4-hectare coffee plantation. They cost around 48 PEN each. He will also use part of the loan to pay his field workers, who help him weed and spread manure on his fields.

loans.use: Buy 17 sacks of compost

loans.name: Melia

texts.es: Melia, de 42 años, es una valerosa madre soltera de 2 hijos: Isbet, de 4 y Yordy, de 1 año de edad. En unión familiar, los tres viven juntos, en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio (selva central peruana). Esa mirada seria que muestra Melia, es reflejo de la vitalidad y fuerza que tiene, pues a pesar de las diversas dificultades que tuvo en la vida, logró sus objetivos. Terminó sus estudios de docencia, ahora es profesora en una escuela del estado peruano, donde enseña a leer y escribir a niños menores, su trabajo es muy bueno y sacrificado, por ello la nombraron supervisora del programa de alfabetización del estado, donde enseñan a leer y escribir a personas de avanzada edad que no pudieron estudiar. Pero la actividad que le enseñaron desde niña, es la agricultura, ya tiene 20 años, dedicándose a la siembra de café, plátano y yuca, los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa, en la cooperativa de su comunidad, como también en diversos mercados de su ciudad. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y agradece a su banco comunal, por darle la oportunidad de salir adelante con su negocio. Ha pensado invertir el crédito en la compra de una motocicleta que oscila entre los 4 mil soles aproximadamente. Con la compra de la motocicleta podrá trasladarse con mayor facilidad asía sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en: Melia, who is 42 years old, is a courageous single mother of 2 children: Isbet, who is 4 years old and Yordy, who is 1 year old.  The three live together as a family unit in their own home, which is located in the Sanchirio community (in the central Peruvian jungle). The serious look Melia has in the photo is a reflection of her vitality and strength.  In spite of the various difficulties her life has given her, she has achieved her goals.  She completed her teaching studies and is now a teacher in a Peruvian state school where she instructs young children in reading and writing.  Because she is very good at her job and self-sacrificing, she was appointed as the supervisor of the State Literacy Program, which teaches elderly people who never had a chance to go to school to read and write.  But the activity she was taught as a young girl was agriculture.  For 20 years, she has been making a living planting coffee, banana trees and cassava.  After each harvest, she sells her produce in the community cooperative and in the various markets in her city.  This is her second loan with MFP, and she is grateful to her communal bank for giving her the opportunity to move her business forward.  She is thinking of investing the loan in the purchase of a motorcycle that fluctuates in price around 4 thousand soles, approximately.  With the purchase of the motorcycle, she will be able to get to and from her farmland more easily.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle so she can get to and from her farmland.

loans.name: Veronica Del Carmen

texts.es:
Verónica, es una joven de 19 años de edad, se dedica a una granja de pollos y también atiende una pupuseria, vive con su esposo, su primer hijo de 2 años de edad y también su suegra, todos trabajan y aportan para los gastos del hogar; este negocio con la granja quien la apoyo y animo fue su suegra y trabajan juntas, no tienen un horario especifico.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para ampliar la granja y la pupuseria, esta inversión le ayudara a tener mejores ingresos, ya que para la pupuseria comprara materiales como chicharrón, pollo, maíz y para la granja pues más animales y alimento, su único riesgo es que se le enfermen los pollos.
Su visión a futuro es crecer a su hijo sanamente y en las condiciones adecuadas, seguir trabajando por mejorar el negocio y lograr estabilidad tanto con las pupusas como con la granja.
texts.en:
Verónica, a 19 year-old young woman, has a chicken farm and also tends a Pupusa (traditional Salvadoran dish) restaurant; she lives with her husband, her first son who is 2 years old, and her mother-in-law; they all work and contribute to the household expenses. Her mother-in-law encouraged her and motivated her to setup the chicken farm and they work together but have no specific schedule.
She is requesting a loan to expand the farm and the Pupusa restaurant; this investment will help her to increase her revenues; for the restaurant, she will buy consumables such as pork, chicken, and corn ; for the farm, she will buy more animals and feed; her only risk is for the chickens to get sick.
Her vision for the future is to grow a healthy son under adequate living conditions, to continue working so she can improve her business, and to achieve stability with the farm and the restaurant.

loans.use: Buy chickens and consumables to prepare Pupusas

loans.name: Jose Agustin

texts.es:
José de 41 años, tiene una pequeña papelería. Vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.

Comenzó a vender láminas papelería, cuadernos, plumas en la parte delantera de su casa. Poco a poco fue comprando más papelería y útiles para venderles a sus vecinos y conocidos del sector donde vive. Para conseguir dinero adicional también recorre las calles vendiendo accesorios para celulares.   

Con el préstamo quiere comprar papelería, cuadernos para su negocio. En el futuro quiere agrandar su negocio y construir mejor su casa.
texts.en:
José, who is 41, has a small stationery store. He lives on the outskirts of the city, in a zone called Paraíso de la Flor (Paradise of Flowers), which is characterized by its dirt roads and mountains.

He began by selling laminated educational materials, notebooks, and pens in the front part of his house. Little by little, he bought more stationary items and tools to sell to his neighbors and acquaintances in the area where he lives. To obtain additional money, he also sells accessories for cell phones as a street vendor.

With the loan, he wants to buy stationery and notebooks for his business. In the future, he wants to increase his business and make improvements on his house.

loans.use: Buy stationery and notebooks for his store

loans.name: G.s. Luz Del Mundo Group

texts.es: Anielca Maria y Doris Mercedes conforman el grupo solidario Luz Del Mundo. Anielca se dedica a la venta de medicamentos, desde hace 25 años que se dedica a este tipo de negocio, inicio por que ella no tenía un medio de ingreso para mantener a su familia por lo que es una mujer muy emprendedora no tiene mucho capital para comprar una gran variedad medicamentos. Su amiga Doris se dedica a la venta de ropa, desde hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, juntas han decidido salir adelante por medio de su financiamiento que será destinado para capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Anielca Maria y Doris Mercedes make up the solidarity group “Luz Del Mundo” (Light of the World). Anielca sells medicines and has been in this business for 25 years; she started her business because she did not have any sources of income to support her family; she is an enterprising woman but she does not have much capital to buy a great assortment of medicines.
Her friend Doris sells clothes and has been in this business for more than 3 years. Together, they have decided to get ahead in life with the help of the loan which will be used as working capital.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Loida

texts.es: Loida, de 30 años, es una valerosa madre soltera, que junto a sus 5 hijos: Jelsy, de 13, Nicol, de 12 y Talía, de 8 años de edad, vive en unión familiar en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio (selva central peruana). Aunque se siente sola en la lucha por educar a sus hijos, Loida no se rinde, ya que según afirma, todos los días reza a Dios para que le de fuerzas, y así pueda salir adelante. Hace 3 años que se dedica a la agricultura, donde tienen más de 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, donde siembra café y plátano. Sus cosechas, gracias a Dios, los venden a muy buen precio. Por ello hace un par de años acondicionó una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su casa, donde todos los días sus pobladores le compran productos de primera necesidad, pero su mayor prioridad es tener capital para invertir en la agricultura. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, ya tiene aproximadamente 2 años trabajando con su banco comunal, donde asegura son personas, comprometidas con el trabajo. Con el crédito que reciba, comprará 5 sacos de abono orgánico, como también en la compra de productos para surtir su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en: Loida, 30 years old, is a courageous single mother of 3 children: Jelsy (13), Nicol (12) and Talía (8); she has a live-in partner and lives in her own house which is located in the community of Sanchirio (Peruvian central jungle). Although she feels alone in the fight to educate her children, Loida does not give up according to her own statements that she prays to God every day to grant her the strength so she can get ahead in life. She has been in the agriculture business for 3 years; she has 3 hectares (unit of measure equivalent to 10,000 square meters or 2.5 acres) of land where she grows coffee and bananas. Her crops, thanks to God, sell at good prices. Consequently, she setup a grocery store in her house where the nearby inhabitants buy basic necessity products every day, but her main priority is to have capital to invest in agriculture. This is the second loan with MFP; she has been working approximately 2 years with her community bank, where she believes the people are committed to their work. With the loan she will receive, she will buy 5 sacks of organic fertilizer as well as products to stock up her grocery store.

loans.use: Buy sacks of fertilizer and products to stock up her store

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
El Sr. Paulino   de 40 años de edad  vive en la Localidad de el Torno hace 3 años oriunda de departamento de Santa Cruz, Su Actividad es la  venta de material de construcción  hace 2 años en su domicilio y también entrega los pedidos que tiene a domicilio a pedido del cliente.
                                                                                                              Su Estado civil esta casado hace 6 años con la  señora Sonia  su  actividad es la venta  de fruta en la localidad del torno, tienen  tres  hijos que se encuentran actualmente estudiando.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  El  señor se siente muy agradecido con nuestra entidad financiera por confiar en el  porque necesita  comprar material de construcción ya que  tiene  muchos pedidos de material y necesita abastecer su deposito para satisfacer las demandas.
texts.en:
Señor Paulino is 40 years old. He has lived in the Torno district in the department of Santa Cruz for 3 years. For two years his business has been selling construction materials. He makes sales from his home and also delivers orders to his customers' homes, at their request.

He has been married for 6 years to Señora Sonia, whose business is selling fruit in Torno. They have three children who are in school.

Señor Paulino is very thankful to this financial institution for the confidence they have shown in him. He needs to buy construction material since he has many orders for material and needs to stock his warehouse to satisfy his customers' requests.

loans.use: Buy construction material

loans.name: Itacuan Group

texts.es:
El siguiente Grupo tiene por nombre “Itacuan”, que significa flor amarilla en la lengua mixteca, se dio este nombre al grupo en honor a la localidad donde habitan sus integrantes, la cruz del itacuan se ubica a 15 minutos de Pinotepa, y la mayoría de sus habitantes hablan la lengua mixteca, también se dedican al trabajo en el campo, a la cría de cabras (chivos). su representante se llama: Francisca Sánchez González, todas las integrantes del grupo dedican su tiempo al empleo personal y a la venta de algunos productos de consumo regional. 
Haremos un espacio para hablar  un poco de la vida de una miembro de este grupo ella es la señora Francisca Sánchez González, quien tiene 39 años de edad, ella es la representante del grupo esta casada con Aron de 40 años, quien es chofer de un taxi del transporte publico, tiene 4 hijos, ellos son: Mirna de 18, Natali de 11, Rafael de 9 y Dalila de 8 años de edad, todos ellos están estudiando actualmente.
Francisca, se dedica a la venta de carne de puerco desde hace mas de 6 años, a ella le gusta su trabajo, a pesar de que apara algunos no sea nada agradable el sacrificar animales, esta es una forma de aportar al gasto familiar y escolar de sus hijos, ella tiene su propio criadero de puercos, que adquiere desde pequeños y se encarga de cuidarlos y alimentarlos hasta que llegan a ser adultos para su venta, ya sea en peso bruto o destazado, esta actividad es poco usual en su comunidad pero se vio en la necesidad de incursionar en esta área, con esta actividad ella puede fomentar el autoconsumo interno de la producción y cría de puercos en la comunidad. Su esposo se dice muy orgulloso de ella y el le ayuda a la cortar la carne y a la elaboración de chicharrón de puerco, para los que no saben que es el chicharrón, es la piel del cerdo mejor conocida como cuero, esta se cocina en grasa hirviendo, hasta llegar al punto de dorarse, es una comida tradicional del pueblo mexicano.
Francisca integro un grupo de crédito, primeramente por su necesidad de un préstamo y la necesidad de sus demás compañeras. Ella utilizo este recurso  para la compra de puercos, el mantenimiento e su corral y para el alimento de los puercos que ella misma esta criando, pudo adquirir mas leña para cocinar el chicharrón, chiles para elaborar chorizo y carne enchilada. 
Uno de sus grandes sueños de Francisca es tener una granja grande de puercos, aumentar sus numero de animales, y así ella podrá dar trabajo a ka gente que habita en esta población para que se desarrollen y puedan progresar ya que los recursos del gobierno están mal invertidos, ella quiere promover la crianza de animales para autoconsumo dentro de la zona, pero para esto se necesita de mas inversión de apoyo por parte de todos y el esfuerzo y compromiso de mas gente que quiera salir adelante, también aspira a tener su propio local comercial para la venta de carne y así como el equipo necesario para facilitar mas su trabajo. También quiere que sus hijos se preparen de manera profesional, que se ganen la vida en oportunidades mejores, y que ellos puedan lograr sus sueños de ellos y de los que los rodean.
Todas las personas que integran este grupo son mujeres muy trabajadoras, llenas de ánimo, son muy alegres y a pesar de la situación en que viven algunas, creen en la realización los sueños y  en la bondad de las demás personas que sirven a los demás, ellas son muy cumplidas con sus compromisos, con sus familias y con su gente, esta es una característica de los indígenas que habitan esta zona de Oaxaca. 
Francisca, esta totalmente agradecida con la nobleza de los que apoyan a los diferentes grupos en el mundo, haciendo así posible los sueños de muchos y mejorando la forma de vivir de los más necesitados. A nombre de las que integran este grupo les manda un fraternal saludo a los que vean esta historia así como una gran abrazo para los que apoye su proyecto.
A continuación aquí se dan a conocer los nombres de las integrantes del grupo “Itacuan” así como sus actividades productivas: 

Heriberta Rafaela R. R.. – Venta de quesos
Emma Sánchez R..- Venta de carne de pollo
Francisca Sánchez González.- Venta de productos para el hogar 
Elizabeth Soledad M. M..-Venta de ropa por catalogo
Carmen C. M..- Venta de comida
Eufemia Inés M. M..- venta de carne de pollo
Araceli R. López.- Venta de pollos
Luisa Sánchez S..- Venta de pollos 
Lucia C. Sánchez.- Venta de ropa
Matilde C. M..- Venta de antojitos
texts.en:
The following group is called "Itacuan", which means yellow flower in the Mixteca language. The group gave itself this name in honour of the locality where the members live. La Cruz de Itacuan is located 15 minutes from Pinotepa and the majority of its inhabitants speak the Mixteca language and work in the countryside raising goats. Their representative is named Francisca Sánchez González, all the members of the group dedicate their time to personal work and the sale of some regionally consumed products. 

We will make space to talk a little about the life of one member of this group. Mrs. Francisca Sánchez González, who is 39 years old, is the representative of the group and is married to Aron, 40 years old, who is a public transport taxi driver. She has 4 children: Mirna, 18; Natali, 11; Rafael 9; and Dalila, 8 years old. They are all currently studying. 

Francisca has sold pork for more than 6 years. She likes her work, even though for some there is nothing pleasant in sacrificing animals, this is a way to contribute to the family expenses and school expenses of her children. She has her own pig farm, which she aquires when they are young and looks after them and feeds them until they are adults to be sold, either by gross weight or cut up. This activity is not very common in her community but she saw the need to enter into this area. With this activity she can boost the internal personal consumption of the production and raising of pigs within the community. Her husband is very proud of her and he helps her to cut the meat and with the production of pork chicharrón. For those who don't know what chicharrón is, it's the skin of the pig, which is cooked in boiling fat until becoming golden. It's a traditional food of the Mexican people.     

Francisca formed a loan group primarily for her need of a loan and the need of her fellow group members. She used this resource for the purchase of pigs, the maintenance of their pen and to feed the pigs which she herself is raising. She was able to acquire more firewood to cook chicharrón, chili peppers to make chorizo and meat seasoned with chili. One of Francisca's biggest dreams is to have a big pig farm, to increase the number of animals, and by this way she will be able to give work to the people who live in this town so that they develop and are able to progress, since government resources are poorly invested. She wants to promote the raising of animals for personal consumption within the zone, but for this it's necessary to have more support investment from everyone and the effort and commitment of more people who want to get ahead. She also aspires to have her own commercial premises for the sale of meat as well as the necessary equipment to further facilitate her work. She also wants her children to prepare themselves professionally, to earn a living with better opportunities, and for them to be able to achieve their dreams and those of those who surround them.    

All the people who make up this group are very hard-working women, full of motivation. They are very happy, and despite the situation in which some of them live, they believe in the fulfillment of their dreams and in the goodness of other people who serve others. They are very fulfilled with their commitments, with their families and with their people. This is a characteristic of the indigenous people who live in this part of Oaxaca.  

Francisca is extremely thankful for the nobility of those who support different groups throughout the world, in this way making possible the dreams of many and improving the lives of those most needy. On behalf of the members of this group, she sends fraternal greetings to whoever sees this story as well as a big hug to those who support her project.

Below are given the names of the members of the "Itacuan" group as well as their production activities: 

Heriberta Rafaela R. R.. – Sale of cheese
Emma Sánchez R..- Sale of chicken
Francisca Sánchez González.- Sale of household products 
Elizabeth Soledad M. M..- Sale of catalogue clothing
Carmen C. M..- Sale of food
Eufemia Inés M. M..- Sale of chicken
Araceli R. López.- Sale of chickens
Luisa Sánchez S..- Sale of chickens
Lucia C. Sánchez.- Sale of clothing
Matilde C. M..- Sale of snacks

loans.use: This loan will be used for the purchase and sale of pork; both for the purchase of more feed for the raising of pigs (piglets), which will be slaughtered and the meat sold, and for the purchase of firewood to prepare chicharron (fried pork).

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es:
María, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 28 años de edad y se dedica a su negocio que es sala de belleza, vive con su madre y su hijo Dilmer de 8 años de edad, ella tiene su sala de belleza ubicada en un barrio cercano a su casa alquilando el local.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tintes, cremas, tratamientos faciales, pintauñas, labiales, con el propósito de tener al cliente lo más necesario para su belleza; también ella considera que de esta manera su inventario estará surtido y en total disponibilidad para los clientes que le visiten.
El sueño de ella es tener estabilidad en su negocio y generar para su hogar los ingresos suficientes para cubrir las necesidades y también apoyar a su hijo con los estudios para que este pueda prepararse y tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
María lives in San Francisco Gotera, department of San Miguel. She is 28 years old and her business is a beauty salon. She lives with her mother and her son Dilmer, who is 8 years old. Her beauty salon is rented, and is located in a neighborhood close to her home.

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy dyes, creams, facial treatments, nail polish, and lipsticks, with the intention to have everything necessary for her customers' beauty. Also, in this way, she considers her inventory to be well-stocked and available for the customers that visit her.

Her dream is to have stability in her business and generate sufficient income for her home to cover the necessities and also support her son with his studies, so that he can prepare himself and have a better future.

loans.use: To buy dyes, creams and facial treatments

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “HUCHUY QOSQO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Lamay perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Daniel; El socio tiene 29 años de edad, el socio es conviviente y tiene  3 hijos el socio trabaja en el ministerio de cultura, el socio también en sus ratos libres sse dedica a la compra y venta de ganados, el socio tiene pasión por los animales y cada cierto tiempo compra ganados vacunos y toros, estos son engordados e incluso participan en ferias locales y nacionales, el socio desea invertir en la compra de un par de ganados nuevos. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ganados vacunos tiernos.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Huchuy Qosqo", which is located in the district of Lamay, belonging to the province of Calca and department of Cusco. The member's name is Daniel, and he is 29 years old. He lives with his wife, has three children, and works in the ministry of culture. In his free time, he also buys and sells livestock. He has a passion for animals and from time to time he buys cattle and bulls, which he fattens up. He also participates in local and national markets. Daniel hopes to invest in the purchase of a pair of new cattle. He is requesting the loan to buy young cattle livestock.

Daniel is thankful for and values the loan granted to him through these means, and therefore he commits to complete the payments owed in the established time frame.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy new cattle livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 20 sacks of fertilizer and a chain saw

loans.name: Johanna Anabel

texts.es:
Johanna de 26 años, da sus servicios como empleada domestica a diferentes casas de Guayaquil. Vive en una casa de ladrillos con su esposo y dos hijos en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.

Comenzó a trabaja para ayudar a su esposo en los gastos ya que él es albañil y no tiene muchos ingresos por lo que tienen dos hijos de 10 y 6 años. Trabaja dando sus servicios como empleada domestica trabajando desde las 07h30am hasta las 18h00pm. Presta sus servicios para planchar, lavar, cocinar. 

Ella quiere darles una mejor vida a sus hijos y ayudarle a su esposo en la construcción de su casa por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo cemento, bloques, arena para construirla por parte. En el futuro quiere tener un negocio para dedicarles más tiempo a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Johanna is 26 years old, and offers her services as a housekeeper in different houses in Guayaquil. She lives in a brick house with her husband and two children in a semi-urban area called Paraíso de la flor, a region characterized by its dirt roads and mountains.

She began working to help her husband with the expenses, since he is a builder and doesn't have a lot of income, and they have two children aged 10 and 6 years old. She works offering her services as a housekeeper from 7:30am until 6pm. She offers services such as ironing, washing, and cooking.

She wants to give her children a better life and help her husband in the construction of the house. For that reason she wants this loan to buy cement, blocks, and sand to construct it in parts. In the future she wants to have a business in order to dedicate more time to her children.

loans.use: Cement, blocks, sand

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Mareela L. S. is a 38-year-old mother of two. She lives in the San José, Costa Rica with her two children. She has worked for several years as a stylist specializing in nail services. She has taken formal classes and continues to take professional courses to keep up to date with the latest fashions and techniques. Over time, she has been able to slowly expand the services that she offers and increase the number of clients that she serves. Mareela enjoys her work because she feels that it is something that she is good at, as well as something she likes to do.  Additionally, because she works out of her house, she is able to care for her children and generate an income.  

Mareela is taking a loan from Fundacion Mujer to buy furniture for her business so that, while clients wait for their appointments, they will have somewhere to sit in her house.  She feels that this will allow her to expand and serve more clients.  It will also help her to reach her business and professional goals, which include having her own house, and studying more in an effort to further expand her business. 
 
Marleela feels that the biggest obstacle to the growth of her business is the fierce competition, because nail salons can be found on every corner of San José neighborhoods.  However, she has been able to overcome this challenge through her excellent customer service, personal attention, and high quality products and services.  She looks forward to the progress she will make by investing this loan in her business.

loans.use: To buy furniture for her nail salon

loans.name: Kusikoyllor Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KUSIKOYLLOR”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma Aurora; ella tiene 57 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica a la venta D. artesanías, ella hace tejidos como chompas, pantalones, chalinas y guantes, la socia venD. también mantas, llaveros y muñecas todos son artesanía, al socia trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor. 

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta D. comida, restaurant, enfermera, artesanía, transporte y  cuidado D. niños.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the community bank "Kusikoyllor", which is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. The member's name is Irma Aurora, she is 57 years old, married and has two children. She is in the business of selling handicrafts; she makes knit work such as sweaters, pants, ties, and gloves. She also sells blankets, key rings, and dolls, all of which are artesanal. She works from 8am until 6pm, and wants to expand and improve her handicraft business. She is requesting the loan to buy handicrafts wholesale.

The other members are in the businesses of: selling food, restaurant, nursing, handicrafts, transport, and caring for children. Irma is thankful to those who form part of this dream through this means, and she commits to making the payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy handicrafts wholesale.

loans.name: Yely Rosa

texts.es:
